title: Passage de Venus
description: Early chronophotography of the 1874 Venus transit, captured by Jules Janssen in Japan using his "photographic revolver" for scientific research.

title: La Rosace Magique
description: Pre-cinematography color animation of Abstract expressionism.

title: Sallie Gardner at a Gallop
description: The clip shows a jockey, Gilbert Domm, riding a horse, Sallie Gardner. The clip is not filmed; instead, it consists of 24 individual photographs shot in rapid succession, making a moving picture when using a zoopraxiscope.

title: Le singe musicien
description: Pre-cinematograph colour animation of the monkey playing his violin

title: Athlete Swinging a Pick
description: In this brief photographic sequence, Eadweard Muybridge himself poses nude and swings a miner's pick, in 18 different photographs.

title: Buffalo Running
description: Individual photographs of the running of a buffalo shot in rapid succession.

title: L'homme machine
description: A machine tries to replicate a man walking.

title: Man Walking Around the Corner
description: A frame sequence featuring a man walking around a corner.

title: Cockatoo Flying
description: This series of images by Muybridge pictures a cockatoo in flight.

title: Child Carrying Flowers to Woman
description: Eadweard Muybridge's motion photography film depicts a child bringing a bouquet of flowers to a topless woman who kisses his cheek.

title: Jumping Over a Man's Back-Leapfrog
description: A brief series photography by British Photographer Eadweard Muybridge featuring two boys playing leapfrog.

title: Man Riding Jumping Horse
description: A man riding a horse jumps over an obstacle.

title: Baboon Climbing a Pole
description: A photographic series depicting a baboon climbing up a pole.

title: Roundhay Garden Scene
description: In the garden, a man asks his friends to do something silly for him to record on film.

title: Accordion Player
description: A very brief film of a man playing the accordion.

title: Traffic Crossing Leeds Bridge
description: A shot of people walking on The Leeds Bridge.

title: Pferd und Reiter Springen uber ein Hindernis
description: A horse with rider jumping over an obstacle

title: Brighton Street Scene
description: Lost film from 1888, directed by William Friese-Greene.

title: Leisurely Pedestrians, Open Topped Buses and Hansom Cabs with Trotting Horses
description: Alleged silent black-and-white short film shot at Apsley Gate, Hyde Park, London.

title: Hyde Park Corner
description: An adult man is walking hand in hand with a child. (A lost film not seen since it was made)

title: Monkeyshines, No. 1
description: One of W.K.L. Dickson's laboratory workers horses around for the camera.

title: Monkeyshines, No. 2
description: In an experiment that follows up on the results of 'Monkeyshines, No. 1', an Edison company worker again moves around in front of the motion picture camera.

title: London's Trafalgar Square
description: A shot of Trafalgar Square.

title: Monkeyshines, No. 3
description: An Edison company worker makes large gestures in front of a Kinetoscope to test the new camera system.

title: Mosquinha
description: Shot of the flight of a fly.

title: Traffic in King's Road, Chelsea
description: Lost film from 1890, directed by William Friese-Greene.

title: Dickson Greeting
description: The very first American film shown to public audiences and the press. It depicts William K.L. Dickson taking off his hat and greeting the audience.

title: Men Boxing
description: Two men wearing boxing gloves prepare to spar in the Edison Company studio.

title: Newark Athlete
description: An athlete swings Indian clubs.

title: Duncan and Another, Blacksmith Shop
description: Experimental short film depicting James C. Duncan and another, unidentified person, most likely Fred C. Devonald.

title: Duncan Smoking
description: Short, experimental film depicting James C. Duncan smoking a pipe.

title: Duncan or Devonald with Muslin Cloud
description: Experimental short film depicting James C. Duncan and Fred C. Devonald, presumably smoking.

title: Monkey and Another, Boxing
description: Lost short film featuring two monkeys fighting.

title: Je vous aime
description: Medium close-up of a man saying "Je vous aime".

title: La vague
description: In this early film experiment a wave crashes against a jagged rock.

title: Two Fencers
description: Shot of two people fencing.

title: Pauvre Pierrot
description: One night, Arlequin comes to see his lover Colombine. But then Pierrot knocks at the door and Colombine and Arlequin hide. Pierrot starts singing but Arlequin scares him and the poor man goes away.

title: Un bon bock
description: Lost 1892 French short animated film directed by Émile Reynaud about a wanderer who orders a good beer ("Un bon bock") and meets a traveler who also orders a beer. They enter an argument because a kitchen boy steals their beers.

title: Le clown et ses chiens
description: Lost short film consisting of 300 painted images. It shows a clown entering a circus ring and greeting the audience before he starts to perform tricks with three dogs. The dogs jump through hoops, walk on a ball and jump over a wand.

title: Fencing
description: Experimental film to test the new kinetoscope which depicts two men practicing fencing.

title: Le prince de Galles
description: This short documentary is a mini-biography of Edward VII, then Prince of Wales and heir apparent to the throne of England. Because his mother, Queen Victoria, reigned for such an unusually long period, he would not receive the cro...

title: Wrestling
description: A lost film, directed by William K.L. Dickson about two men wrestling.

title: Boxing
description: Lost film, possibly depicting two men boxing.

title: Blacksmith Scene
description: Three men hammer on an anvil and pass a bottle of beer around.

title: Annabelle Butterfly Dance
description: Annabelle (Whitford) Moore performs one of her popular dances. For this performance, her costume has a pair of wings attached to her back, to suggest a butterfly. As she dances, she uses her long, flowing skirts to create visual p...

title: Edison Kinetoscope Records: Annie Oakley
description: Annie Oakley, the 'Little Miss Sure Shot' of the 'Wild West' gives an exhibition of rifle shooting at glass balls and clay pigeons in a film from the Edison Catalog.

title: Autour d'une cabine
description: Pre-cinematograph colour animation of a woman and man at the beach.

title: Barbershop, The
description: Customer gets a lightning-fast shave.

title: Bucking Broncho
description: A fine exhibition of horsemanship by Lee Martin, a genuine cowboy. This particular broncho is an unusually wicked one. (from Edison Films)

title: Buffalo Dance
description: Three Sioux Indians perform a 'buffalo dance', while two others use drums to supply a rhythm. The three dancers move around in a circle as they perform the various actions that are part of the dance.

title: Edison Kinetoscopic Record of a Sneeze
description: A man (Thomas Edison's assistant) takes a pinch of snuff and sneezes. This is one of the earliest Thomas Edison films and was the second motion picture to be copyrighted in the United States.

title: Dickson Experimental Sound Film
description: The earliest extant sound film, but the phonograph soundtrack has been lost. It depicts William K.L. Dickson standing in the background next to a huge sound pickup horn connected to a Thomas Edison phonograph recorder.

title: Corbett and Courtney Before the Kinetograph
description: James J. Corbett and Peter Courtney meet in a boxing exhibition.

title: Falling Cat
description: A cat falls down and lands on its feet.

title: Glenroy Bros., No. 2
description: The Glenroy Brothers perform a portion of their vaudeville act, "The Comic View of Boxing: The Tramp & the Athlete".

title: Glenroy Brothers
description: The Glenroy Brothers perform a portion of their vaudeville act, "The Comic View of Boxing: The Tramp & the Athlete", which depicts a boxer with a classic style trying to contend with an opponent who uses a very unorthodox approach.

title: Leonard-Cushing Fight
description: Short depicting the box-fight between Mike Leonard and Jack Cushing fight.

title: Luis Martinetti, Contortionist
description: Luis Martinetti, a contortionist suspended from acrobatic flying rings, contorts himself for about thirty seconds. This is one of the first films made for Edison's kinetoscopes.

title: Miss Jerry
description: The adventures of a female reporter in the 1890s.

title: Tables Turned on the Gardener
description: An impudent child plays a prank on a gardener innocently watering his plants.

title: Execution of Mary, Queen of Scots, The
description: This short film, one of the first to use camera tricks, depicts the execution of Mary, Queen of Scots.

title: Akrobatisches Potpourri
description: The fifth sequence of the "Wintergartenprogramm (1895)" by the Skladanowsky Brothers. In it, eight circus performers known as the Grunato Family perform their famous balancing act.

title: Annabelle Serpentine Dance
description: Annabelle (Whitford) Moore performs one of her popular dance routines. She uses her dance steps and her long, flowing skirts to create a variety of visual patterns.

title: Italienischer Bauerntanz
description: The first sequence of the "Wintergartenprogramm (1895)" by the Skladanowsky Brothers. In it, two children, Ploetz and Larella, perform an Italian peasant dance.

title: Baby's Dinner
description: As part of a maiden public film screening at the Salon Indien, on December 28, in Paris, Auguste Lumière pivots the centre of attention around his baby daughter, as he tries to feed her from a spoon.

title: Billy Edwards and the Unknown
description: Billy Edwards and a challenger named Warwick fight an exhibition boxing match.

title: Blacksmith Scene
description: Two blacksmiths work while the vapors rise in the air. Later, another man arrives and offers a drink.

title: Barque sortant du port
description: Three men in a rowboat are leaving the harbor.

title: House of the Devil, The
description: With the help of a magic cauldron, Mephistopheles conjures up a variety of supernatural characters.

title: Une nuit terrible
description: A man tries to get a good night's sleep, but is disturbed by a giant spider that leaps onto his bed, and a battle ensues in hilarious comic fashion.

title: La fee aux choux
description: Fantasy tale involving a fairy who can produce and deliver babies coming out of cabbages. Gently moving through the cabbages and using of lovely gestures, she takes one baby out of there, then makes more magic and delivers two more.

title: Arrival of a Train, The
description: A train arrives at La Ciotat station.

title: Sandow
description: Strong-man Eugene (Eugen) Sandow poses in a long shot on a bare stage against a black background, wearing only tight trunks and laced sandals. He begins with his arms folded against his chest, looking off screen left, then strikes...

title: Alger: rue Bab-Azoun
description: A short black and white film from the Lumière Brothers which documents a busy street scene.

title: Lassage des boeufs pour le labour
description: Helped by riders who move between the animals, cow herders pass a rope around the necks of the oxen and then lead them away.

title: Lancement d'un navire
description: A ship is launched into the water.

title: Bataille de neige
description: People start a snowball fight on a street in Lyons, France.

title: Four Heads Are Better Than One
description: Much to our amazement, an elegant and masterful illusionist detaches his own head effortlessly from his shoulders for a once-in-a-lifetime performance.

title: Astronomer's Dream; or, The Man in the Moon, The
description: An astronomer falls asleep and has a strange dream involving a fairy queen and the Moon.

title: Temptation of St. Anthony, The
description: The pious St. Anthony is tormented by visions of seductive women.

title: A Turn of the Century Illusionist
description: A magician and his assistant perform numerous magic acts.

title: Cinderella
description: A fairy godmother magically turns Cinderella's rags to a beautiful dress, and a pumpkin into a coach. Cinderella goes to the ball, where she meets the Prince - but will she remember to leave before the magic runs out?

title: Sherlock Holmes Baffled
description: Sherlock Holmes enters his drawing room to find it being burgled, but on confronting the villain is surprised when the latter disappears. Holmes initially attempts to ignore the event by lighting a cigar, but upon the thief's reap...

title: Enchanted Drawing, The
description: A cartoonist defies reality when he draws objects that become three-dimensional after he lifts them off his sketch pad.

title: Grandma's Reading Glass
description: A boy looks through glasses at various objects, seen magnified.

title: As Seen Through A Telescope (a.k.a The Professor and His Field Glass)
description: An elderly gentleman in a silk hat sits on a stool in front of a store on the main street of town. He has a telescope that he focuses on the ankle of a young woman who is a short distance away. Her husband catches the gent looking...

title: Explosion of a Motor Car (a.k.a The Dlights of Automobiling)
description: As two couples enjoy their evening promenade in a nice but rickety open motor car, without notice, an explosion blows the vehicle to smithereens.

title: Hamlet ( Le Duel d'Hamlet)
description: The final duel in 'Hamlet', in the first film of the play.

title: One-Man Band, The
description: A band-leader assembles an orchestra by mystifying means.

title: Grandma Threading Her Needle
description: A picture true to life, and a most excellent subject. Poor old grandma is seated in her chair, vainly attempting to engage a thread in the eye of the needle. The facial contortions that are engaged in are ludicrous to say the leas...

title: Searching Ruins on Broadway, Galveston, for Dead Bodies
description: This shows the heart of the tremendous drifts in the east end of Galveston. Hundreds of bodies are concealed in these immense masses, and at the time the picture was taken the odor given out could be detected for miles. The subjec...

title: Let Me Dream Again
description: A man dreams he is flirting with an attractive young lady, then he wakes up in bed next to his wife.

title: Doctor and the Monkey, The
description: A doctor's monkey escapes from its cage, and causes mayhem about the office.

title: L'homme a la tete en caoutchouc
description: A chemist carries out a bizarre experiment with his own head.

title: Reve et realite
description: A well-dressed middle-aged man is enjoying a drink at a table with a pretty young woman. He flirts with her, and she seems not to mind his attentions. But is it all too good to be true?

title: Bluebeard
description: A young woman becomes the eighth wife of the wealthy Bluebeard, whose first seven wives have died under mysterious circumstances.

title: Le voyage dans la lune
description: A group of astronomers go on an expedition to the Moon.

title: Gulliver's Travels
description: Gulliver washes ashore on Lilliput, the inhabitants of which are no more than six inches tall. He later travels to Brobdingnag, a country populated by giants.

title: Twentieth Century Tramp; or, Happy Hooligan and His Airship, The
description: A comic picture that defies description. It depicts the Twentieth Century up-to-date tramp flying over the chimney tops of New York City in the latest improved flying machine. Weary Willie has the indispensible tin can hanging fro...

title: Mephistopheles' School of Magic
description: The setting of this fantastic scene represents the hall of an old chateau in which a miser has locked up seven large bags containing his wealth. Satan, who has made his way into the chateau, puts the seven bags in a strong box, an...

title: Great Train Robbery, The
description: A group of bandits stage a brazen train hold-up, only to find a determined posse hot on their heels.

title: Infernal Boiling Pot, The
description: Two demons throw helpless captives into a boiling cauldron, and then try to summon forth their spirits.

title: Music Lover, The
description: The leader of a marching band demonstrates an unusual way of writing music.

title: Monster, The
description: Against a moonlit Egyptian backdrop duly encompassing the Sphinx, a narrator explains how a prince hires a mystic to bring back his beloved late wife.

title: Enchanted Well, The
description: Denied a handout, a witch exacts vengeance by cursing the village well.

title: Cook in Trouble, The
description: A cook has his hands full with three mischievous devils, who pop in and out of his kitchen.

title: Living Playing Cards, The
description: With a brand-new deck of playing cards in his hand, an elegantly-attired thaumaturge, by fire and the pure power of illusion, transforms a plain nine of spades card into a full-size Queen of Hearts.

title: Untamable Whiskers, The
description: Through a rapid succession of drawings, ingenious disguises and soft dissolves, the director portrays a quick-sketch artist who transforms to various characters according to the static outlines on his chalkboard.

title: Le voyage a travers l'impossible
description: Using every known means of transportation, several savants from the Geographic Society undertake a journey through the Alps to the Sun which finishes under the sea.

title: Scheming Gambler's Paradise, The
description: Despite all methods of instantaneously masking a clandestine gambling den's shady activities, the risk of getting caught is high, especially when the police thirsts for success. But, sometimes, indulging in pure fun is just too te...

title: Black Imp, The
description: A traveler at an inn is harassed by a mischievous devil in his room.

title: Story of the Kelly Gang, The
description: Originally 70 minutes in running time, only 17 minutes of the world's first full-length narrative feature film survived in stills and other fragments and tell the story of Ned Kelly, an infamous 19th-century Australian outlaw.

title: Mysterious Retort, The
description: Sound asleep in his comfortable armchair next to a high-pressure retort, a mystic silver-haired alchemist can't even notice the strange manifestations emerging from the vessel's bottom. Is this a dream, or a cornucopia of secreted...

title: Humorous Phases of Funny Faces
description: A cartoonist draws faces and figures on a blackboard - and they come to life.

title: Hilarious Posters, The
description: A wall full of advertising posters comes to life.

title: 400 Tricks of the Devil, The
description: Two travelers are tormented by Satan from inn to inn and eventually experience a buggy ride through the heavens courtesy of the Devil.

title: A Funny Shave
description: A man tries to shave, but his mirror keeps playing tricks on him.

title: Consequence of Feminism, The
description: In a society in which gender roles are switched, will men tolerate being unequal?

title: Eclipse: Courtship of the Sun and Moon, The
description: As the clock strikes twelve, a weary astronomer attempts to answer the impertinent enquiries of his young students by scrutinising an impending lunar eclipse, as an effeminate and delicate moon caresses the mighty sun's hungry cos...

title: Good Glue Sticks
description: A hawker demonstrates his glue's exceptional qualities; however, a pair of policemen shut him down. Bent on revenge, he goes to extreme lengths for justice, but it's a risky action, and one could easily get a taste of his own medi...

title: Unusual Cooking
description: A chef comes into the kitchen and throws a lot of rags on the floor: he then casts a spell over them, and immediately they take the form of human beings, and dance a wild saraband around the place. After performing many unique tri...

title: Princess Nicotine; or, The Smoke Fairy
description: A drowsy pipe-smoker attempts to nap, only to be tormented relentlessly by the mischievous Princess Nicotine and her fairy companion.

title: Devilish Tenant, The
description: A man rents an apartment and furnishes it in remarkable fashion.

title: Le barometre de la fidelite
description: A young couple, Max and Jane, whose relationship has cooled after a year of marriage, leading both to engage in secret extramarital affairs.

title: Tilly the Tomboy Visits the Poor
description: Tilly the Tomboy and her pseudo-angelic friend are at it again. This time, they visit a bedridden woman, steal a truck and turn a bakery upside down in their pursuit of mischief.

title: Mobilier fidele
description: A film of more than unusual interest. Those who are familiar with the length of time it takes to make a picture wherein oil the furniture in the house moves out automatically, will appreciate the great labor of making this film.

title: A Trip to Mars
description: A scientist discovers reverse gravity and goes to Mars in the process.

title: Cleopatra
description: The fabled queen of Egypt's affair with Roman general Marc Antony is ultimately disastrous for both of them.

title: Invaders, The
description: The U.S. Army and the Indians sign a peace treaty. However, a group of surveyors trespass on the Indians' land and violate the treaty. The Army refuses to listen to the Indians' complaints, and the surveyors are killed by the Indi...

title: Max and the Donkey
description: Joe Dawson is in the part of the donkey. He, Joe, is represented as being engaged to a pretty girl, who is accustomed to take a ride on her donkey every day. Max writes to the girl for an appointment. Joe decides to teach Max a le...

title: Voyage of the Bourrichon Family, The
description: The Bourrichon Family is in debt and must go on a journey to escape their creditors. But these creditors are persistent and pursue the family wherever they go, until the family must finally give up hope of escaping them and are fo...

title: Suspense
description: Abandoned by her maidservant in an isolated country house, a mother must protect herself and her baby from an invading tramp while her husband races home in a stolen car to save them.

title: A Florida Enchantment
description: A young woman discovers a seed that can make women act like men and men act like women. She decides to take one, then slips one to her maid and another to her fiancé. The fun begins.

title: Birth of a Nation, The
description: The Stoneman family finds its friendship with the Camerons affected by the Civil War, both fighting in opposite armies. The development of the war in their lives plays through to Lincoln's assassination and the birth of the Ku Klu...

title: Hypocrites
description: The parallel stories of a modern preacher and a medieval monk, Gabriel the Ascetic, who is killed by an ignorant mob for making a nude statue representing Truth, which is also represented by a ghostly naked girl who flits througho...

title: Alice in Wonderland
description: Alice goes with her sister to a picnic and then she falls asleep and starts dreaming about a wonderland full of talking animals and walking playing cards.

title: Gretchen the Greenhorn
description: A kind Dutch immigrant and her bumbling father are blackmailed by a gang of counterfeiters.

title: Lady Windermere's Fan
description: A Lady mistakes her husband's mother for his mistress and takes a lover.

title: Vagabond, The
description: Charlie, the emotional violinist, flees to a gipsy camp, only to find himself playing for an abducted girl. Soon, a unique birthmark will pave the way for an unexpected rescue and a marvellous new life. But, will she forget him so...

title: Intolerance: Love's Struggle Throughout the Ages
description: Four historical tales depict the ongoing human struggle against prejudice and inhumanity.

title: Snow White
description: Snow White, a beautiful girl, is despised by a wicked queen who tries to destroy her. With the aid of dwarves in the woods, Snow White overcomes the queen.

title: A Tale of Two Cities
description: Alcoholic lawyer Sydney Carton travels to Paris during the Reign of Terror to rescue French aristocrat Charles Darnay, husband of the woman he loves.

title: Rebecca of Sunnybrook Farm
description: With her family in financial difficulties, Rebecca is sent to live with her two strict, unfeeling aunts, who do not appreciate the young girl's charm and energy. Rebecca must make new friends and adjust to surroundings that are so...

title: Poor Little Rich Girl, The
description: The wealthy but selfish parents of a lonely young girl begin to rethink what is important to them after a servant's irresponsibility results in a crisis.

title: A Romance of the Redwoods
description: A young girl travels west to live with her uncle during the California Gold Rush only to find that he has been killed by Indians and his identity assumed by an outlaw.

title: Raffles, the Amateur Cracksman
description: Gentleman burglar Raffles tries to get his hand on a priceless pearl.

title: Tarzan of the Apes
description: Reared by a childless ape, the orphaned heir of the Greystokes becomes one of the apes. Then Dr Porter organises a rescue expedition, and his beautiful daughter Jane catches his attention. Has Tarzan of the Apes found the perfect ...

title: Stella Maris
description: Two young women - a paraplegic girl sheltered by her wealthy guardians and a more experienced orphan - fall in love with a man separated from his violent wife.

title: Are Crooks Dishonest?
description: Con artists Harold and Snub attempt to outwit phony psychic Miss Goulash and her "professor" father.

title: Ich mochte kein Mann sein
description: A teenaged tomboy, tired of being bossed around by her strict guardian, impersonates a man so she can have more fun, but discovers that being the opposite sex isn't as easy as she had hoped.

title: When the Clouds Roll by
description: Psychiatrist Dr. Ulrich Metz attempts to drive Daniel Brown to suicide.

title: Broken Blossoms or The Yellow Man and the Girl
description: A frail waif, abused by her brutal boxer father in London's seedy Limehouse District, is befriended by a sensitive Chinese immigrant with tragic consequences.

title: Cabinet of Dr. Caligari, The
description: Hypnotist Dr. Caligari uses a somnambulist, Cesare, to commit murders.

title: Pollyanna
description: An orphan's optimistic outlook brings a change to the ill-tempered town in which she resides to her aunt.

title: Within Our Gates
description: Abandoned by her fiancé, an educated black woman with a shocking past dedicates herself to helping a near bankrupt school for impoverished black youths.

title: Orphans of the Storm
description: Two orphaned sisters are caught up in the turmoil of the French Revolution, encountering misery and love along the way.

title: Kid, The
description: The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put their relationship in jeopardy.

title: Blot, The
description: Professor teaches unmotivated wealthy students. Neighbor Olsen is rich, Griggs family is poor. Olsen and Reverend Gates admire Amelia Griggs. Wealthy student Phil befriends Reverend, recognizes class divide, tries to help.

title: Körkarlen (The Phantom Carriage)
description: On New Year's Eve, the driver of a ghostly carriage forces a drunken man to reflect on his selfish, wasted life.

title: Nosferatu, eine Symphonie des Grauens
description: Vampire Count Orlok expresses interest in a new residence and real estate agent Hutter's wife.

title: Phantom, The
description: A shiftless young man becomes obsessed with a mysterious woman and yearns to find her again.

title: Nathan der Weise
description: Set in Jerusalem during the Third Crusade, it describes how the wise Jewish merchant Nathan, the enlightened sultan Saladin and the (initially anonymous) Templar bridge their gaps between Judaism, Islam and Christianity.

title: Man from Beyond, The
description: A man who has been frozen in the Arctic ice for 100 years returns to civilization to find his lost love.

title: Häxan: Witchcraft Through the Ages
description: Fictionalized documentary showing the evolution of witchcraft, from its pagan roots to its confusion with hysteria in Eastern Europe.

title: Paleface, The
description: Buster helps a Native American tribe save their land from greedy oil barons.

title: Nanook of the North
description: In this silent predecessor to the modern documentary, film-maker Robert J. Flaherty spends one year following the lives of Nanook and his family, Inuits living in the Arctic Circle.

title: Foolish Wives
description: A con artist masquerades as Russian nobility and attempts to seduce the wife of an American diplomat.

title: Dr. Mabuse, der Spieler - Ein Bild der Zeit
description: Arch-criminal Dr. Mabuse sets out to make a fortune and run Berlin. Detective Wenk sets out to stop him.

title: Safety Last!
description: A boy leaves his small country town and heads to the big city to get a job. As soon as he makes it big his sweetheart will join him and marry him. His enthusiasm to get ahead leads to some interesting adventures.

title: Why Worry?
description: A hypochondriac vacations in the tropics for the fresh air - and finds himself in the middle of a revolution instead.

title: Silent Command, The
description: Benedict Hisston is a foreign agent, part of a conspiracy to destroy the Panama Canal and the US Navy's Atlantic Fleet. He attempts to acquire information about mine placement in the Canal Zone from Captain Richard Decatur but fai...

title: La souriante Madame Beudet
description: An unhappily married woman devises a scheme to get rid of her husband.

title: Our Hospitality
description: A man returns to his Appalachian homestead. On the trip, he falls for a young woman. The only problem is her family has vowed to kill every member of his family.

title: A Woman of Paris
description: A kept woman runs into her former fiancé and finds herself torn between love and comfort.

title: Die Nibelungen
description: Siegfried, son of King Siegmund of Xanten, sets off on a treacherous journey to the Kingdom of Burgundy to ask King Gunther for the hand of his sister, the beautiful Princess Kriemhild.

title: Kriemhild's Revenge
description: Princess Kriemhild vows to avenge her husband's murder but must overcome her brothers who swore allegiance to Hagen. She marries Etzel, King of the Huns, and persuades his army to attack Hagen, but she loses more than she bargaine...

title: Thief of Bagdad, The
description: A recalcitrant thief vies with a duplicitous Mongol ruler for the hand of a beautiful princess.

title: Wild Oranges
description: Millie Stope lives with her grandfather on a remote island. Her grandfather fled there for political reasons. But they're not alone. An escaped prisoner, Nicholas, is terrorizing them, and further more, he's interested in Mllie. J...

title: Navigator, The
description: Two spoiled rich people find themselves trapped on an empty passenger ship.

title: Sherlock Jr.
description: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

title: Girl Shy
description: A shy young man who can't talk to women ventures out to publish a book full of fictional conquests, but finds true love along the way.

title: Manhandled
description: Gloria Swanson plays Tessie McGuire, a shopgirl who, when her boyfriend breaks their date one evening, goes to a party with a louche crowd of artists and hangers-on. She wows them with some zesty mimicry, and so gains an introduct...

title: Great White Silence, The
description: In 1910 the British Antarctic Expedition, led by Capt. Robert F. Scott, embarks from Lyttleton, NZ on a quest to become the first to reach the South Pole.

title: Help!
description: Max accepts a wager that he cannot remain in a haunted castle for one hour (11 PM to midnight) without crying for help. As soon as he arrives he encounters strange and nightmarish visions, but he is nevertheless on the verge of wi...

title: Greed
description: The sudden fortune won from a lottery fans such destructive greed that it ruins the lives of the three people involved.

title: Phantom of the Opera, The
description: A mad, disfigured composer seeks love with a lovely young opera singer.

title: Battleship Potemkin
description: In the midst of the Russian Revolution of 1905, the crew of the battleship Potemkin mutiny against the brutal, tyrannical regime of the vessel's officers. The resulting street demonstration in Odessa brings on a police massacre.

title: Gold Rush, The
description: A prospector goes to the Klondike during the 1890s gold rush in hopes of making his fortune, and is smitten with a girl he sees in a dance hall.

title: Go West
description: With little luck at keeping a job in the city a New Yorker tries work in the country and eventually finds his way leading a herd of cattle to the West Coast.

title: Freshman, The
description: A nerdy college student will do anything to become popular on campus.

title: Seven Chances
description: A man learns that he will inherit a fortune if he marries by 7PM that evening.

title: Lost World, The
description: The first film adaptation of Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's classic novel about a land where prehistoric creatures still roam.

title: Big Parade, The
description: A young American soldier witnesses the horrors of the Great War.

title: Stachka
description: A group of oppressed factory workers go on strike in pre-revolutionary Russia.

title: Temptress, The
description: An architect tries suppressing his passion for a seductive woman.

title: Flesh and the Devil
description: Childhood friends are torn apart when one of them marries the woman the other fiercely loves.

title: General, The
description: After being rejected by the Confederate military, not realizing it was due to his crucial civilian role, an engineer must single-handedly recapture his beloved locomotive after it is seized by Union spies and return it through ene...

title: For Heaven's Sake
description: An irresponsible young millionaire changes his tune when he falls for the daughter of a downtown minister.

title: So's Your Old Man
description: An unlucky inventor's attempt to demonstrate his break-proof glass at a convention goes humiliatingly wrong, but his luck may be about to change when he runs into pretty young woman on the train ride home.

title: Die Abenteuer des Prinzen Achmed
description: A handsome prince rides a flying horse to faraway lands and embarks on magical adventures, which include befriending a witch, meeting Aladdin, battling demons and falling in love with a princess.

title: It
description: A salesgirl pursues a handsome playboy.

title: Metropolis
description: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working-class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

title: Abel Gance's Napoleon
description: A film about the French general's youth and early military career.

title: Unknown, The
description: A circus freak goes to horrific lengths to win the woman he admires.

title: Sunrise: A Song of Two Humans
description: A married farmer falls under the spell of a sophisticated woman from the city, who tries to convince him to drown his wife.

title: Kid Brother, The
description: A sheriff's milquetoast son has a chance to prove himself when a medicine show run by con artists comes into town.

title: Nevada
description: A gunslinger looking for a quiet place to settle down becomes entangled in a romantic triangle and the hunt for a gang of cattle rustlers.

title: My Best Girl
description: A department store's stock girl falls in love with a co-worker, the son of the store's manager; the feeling is mutual though he is engaged to a debutante and focusing on becoming successful without the influence of his father.

title: Wings
description: Two young men, one rich, one middle class, who are in love with the same woman, become fighter pilots in World War I.

title: Jazz Singer, The
description: The son of a Jewish Cantor must defy the traditions of his religious father in order to pursue his dream of becoming a jazz singer.

title: Downhill [When Boys Leave Home]
description: Bound by honor, a successful schoolboy takes the blame for his roommate's indiscretion, and it's all downhill from there.

title: Cat and the Canary, The
description: Relatives of an eccentric millionaire gather in his spooky mansion on the 20th anniversary of his death for the reading of his will.

title: Passion of Joan of Arc, The
description: In 1431, Jeanne d'Arc is placed on trial on charges of heresy, and the ecclesiastical jurists attempt to force her to recant her claims of holy visions.

title: Speedy
description: Harold "Speedy" Swift, a fan of Babe Ruth and the New York Yankees, saves from extinction the city's last horse-drawn trolley, operated by his girlfriend's grandfather.

title: Circus, The
description: The Tramp finds work and the girl of his dreams at a circus.

title: Cameraman, The
description: Hopelessly in love with a woman working at MGM Studios, a clumsy man attempts to become a motion-picture cameraman to be close to the object of his desire.

title: Steamboat Bill, Jr.
description: The effete son of a cantankerous riverboat captain comes to join his father's crew.

title: Racket, The
description: An honest police captain vows to bring down a powerful bootlegger who is protected by corrupt politicians and judges.

title: Beggars of Life
description: After killing her treacherous step-father, a girl escapes with a young vagabond and dresses as a boy. They hop freight trains, quarrel with a group of hobos, and use a stolen car in their attempt to reach Canada.

title: Power of the Press, The

title: A Girl in Every Port
description: Two sailors with a rivalry over chasing women become friends. But when one decides to finally settle down, will this mysterious young women come between them?

title: Patsy, The
description: An awkward teenager hopelessly in love with her older sister's boyfriend tries to make him notice her.

title: While the City Sleeps
description: A tough New York cop is determined to bring down a crook who has always managed to provide an alibi for the crimes he's been accused of, even though the detective knows he's guilty of committing them.

title: Man Who Laughs, The

title: Crowd, The

title: Docks of New York, The
description: A blue-collar worker on New York's depressed waterfront finds his life changed after he saves a woman attempting suicide.

title: Our Dancing Daughters
description: A flapper who's secretly a good girl and a gold digging floozy masquerading as an ingénue both vie for the hand of a millionaire.

title: Cocoanuts, The

title: Pandora's Box (Die Büchse der Pandora)

title: Man with a Movie Camera

title: Blackmail

title: Throw of the Dice

title: Juno and the Paycock [The Shame of Mary Boyle]

title: Broadway Melody

title: Blue Angel, The
description: An elderly professor's ordered life spins dangerously out of control when he falls for a nightclub singer.

title: All Quiet on the Western Front
description: A German youth eagerly enters World War I, but his enthusiasm wanes as he gets a firsthand view of the horror.

title: Anna Christie
description: A young woman reunites with her estranged father and falls in love with a sailor, but struggles to tell them about her dark past.

title: Ladies of Leisure
description: An upper-crust artist hires a 'party girl' as a model; romance follows.

title: L'Age d'Or
description: A surrealist tale of a man and a woman who are passionately in love with each other, but their attempts to consummate that passion are constantly thwarted by their families, the Church, and bourgeois society.

title: Morocco
description: A cabaret singer and a Legionnaire fall in love, but their relationship is complicated by the results of his womanizing and the appearance of a rich man who wants her for himself.

title: Min and Bill
description: Min, the owner of a dockside hotel, is forced to make difficult decisions about the future of Nancy, the young woman she took in as an infant.

title: Be Yourself
description: Ethnic comedy of a nightclub entertainer trying to train a boxer.

title: Bat Whispers, The
description: A master criminal terrorizes the occupants of an isolated country mansion.

title: Murder!
description: A juror in a murder trial, after voting to convict, has second thoughts and begins to investigate on his own before the execution.

title: Animal Crackers
description: Mayhem and zaniness ensue when a valuable painting goes missing during a party in honor of famed African explorer Captain Spaulding.

title: M
description: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

title: Mädchen in Uniform
description: At an all-girls boarding school, Manuela falls in love with a teacher, to terrific consequences.

title: Night Nurse
description: A nurse enlists the help of a petty criminal to foil a sinister plot to murder two children.

title: Frankenstein
description: Dr Henry Frankenstein is obsessed with assembling a living being from parts of several exhumed corpses.

title: Anna Christie
description: A young woman reunites with her estranged father and falls in love with a sailor, but struggles to tell them about her dark past.

title: Mata Hari
description: A semi-fictionalized account of the life of Mata Hari, an exotic dancer who was accused of spying for Germany during World War I.

title: Tabu: A Story of the South Seas
description: On the South Pacific island of Bora Bora, a young couple's love is threatened when the tribal chief declares the girl a sacred virgin.

title: Indiscreet
description: A young woman jeopardizes the relationship with the man she loves when a no-account from her past shows up.

title: Last Flight, The
description: World War I veterans roam Paris, drinking and admiring a woman they recently met.

title: Pardon Us
description: Two guys end up in prison after attempting to sell beer to a policeman during Prohibition.

title: Dracula
description: Transylvanian vampire Count Dracula bends a naive real estate agent to his will, then takes up residence at a London estate where he sleeps in his coffin by day and searches for potential victims by night.

title: Monkey Business
description: On a transatlantic crossing, The Marx Brothers get up to their usual antics and manage to annoy just about everyone on board the ship.

title: City Lights
description: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

title: Smiling Lieutenant, The
description: An amorous lieutenant is forced to marry a socially awkward princess, though he tries to keep his violin-playing girlfriend on the side.

title: Cheat, The
description: Woman in debt makes an impulsive investment which doesn't go her way.

title: Public Enemy, The
description: An Irish-American street punk tries to make it big in the world of organized crime.

title: La Chienne
description: Maurice Legrand, a meek cashier married to a nagging wife, has a secret passion: he's a Sunday painter. He falls in love with Lulu, a young woman dominated by Dédé, the pimp who she works for. Dédé pushes Lulu into a relationship ...

title: A Nous la Liberte
description: Seeking better life, two convicts escape from prison.

title: Little Caesar
description: A small-time criminal moves to a big city to seek bigger fortune.

title: Skin Game, The
description: An old traditional family and a modern family battle over land in a small English village and almost destroy each other.

title: Rich and Strange [East of Shanghai]
description: Believing that an unexpected inheritance will bring them happiness, a married couple instead finds their relationship strained to the breaking point.

title: Dracula
description: Centuries-old vampire Dracula preys upon the innocent Eva and her friends.

title: Cimarron
description: A newspaper editor settles in an Oklahoma boom town with his reluctant wife at the end of the nineteenth century.

title: Hyppolit a lakaj
description: A butler changes the life of a nouveau-riche entrepreneur's life, while his daughter falls in love with the company's manager instead of a suitor chosen for her.

title: Skippy
description: Skippy, the mischievous son of a wealthy doctor, meets Sooky in poverty-ridden Shantytown, and together they try to save Sooky's pet from a cruel dogcatcher.

title: Champ, The
description: An alcoholic ex-boxer struggles to provide a good living for his son.

title: I Am a Fugitive from a Chain Gang
description: A World War I veteran and aspiring engineer tries to re-enter civilian life. After being unwillingly caught up in a robbery, he suffers the intolerable conditions of a Southern chain gang, struggling to clear his name and prove hi...

title: Grand Hotel
description: A group of very different individuals staying at a luxurious hotel in Berlin deal with each of their respective dramas.

title: Age of Consent, The
description: College co-eds learn to handle the responsibilities of romance.

title: Horse Feathers
description: Quincy Adams Wagstaff, Huxley University's new president, accidentally hires bumblers Baravelli and Pinky to help his school win the big football game against their rival, Darwin University.

title: White Zombie
description: A young man turns to a witch doctor to lure the woman he loves away from her fiancé, but instead turns her into a zombie slave.

title: Boudu Saved from Drowning
description: A bookseller saves a tramp from drowning and shelters him, but the tramp's odd behavior starts to wear everyone down.

description: Two young brothers throw a tantrum when they discover that their father isn't the most important man in his workplace.

description: A mad doctor conducts ghastly genetic experiments on a remote island in the South Seas, much to the fear and disgust of the shipwrecked sailor who finds himself trapped there.

title: Vampyr
description: A drifter obsessed with the supernatural stumbles upon an inn from which a series of strange events lead him to a manor where a severely ill adolescent girl is slowly becoming a vampire.

title: Shanghai Express
description: A notorious woman rides a train through a dangerous situation with a British captain she loved.

title: Scarface

title: Red-Headed Woman
description: A gold-digging secretary will do whatever it takes to get ahead in society-including luring her morally minded boss away from his happy marriage.

title: Death Kiss, The
description: Murder during film shoot sparks search for a killer.

title: Thirteen Women
description: A young woman plots astrological revenge on schoolgirls from her past.

title: Blue Light (Das Blaue Licht), The
description: When the moon is full, young men die attempting to reach the mysterious blue light in the mountains.

title: Number 17
description: A gang of thieves gather at a safe house following a robbery, but a detective is on their trail.

title: Bitter Tea of General Yen, The
description: A Chinese warlord and an engaged Christian missionary fall in love.

title: Footlight Parade

description: Queen Christina of Sweden is a popular monarch who is loyal to her country. However, when she falls in love with a Spanish envoy, she must choose between the throne and the man she loves.

title: King Kong
description: A film crew goes to a tropical island for a location shoot, where they capture a colossal ape who takes a shine to their blonde starlet, and bring him back to New York City.

title: Little Women
description: A chronicle of the lives of sisters growing up in 19th-century New England.

title: Alice in Wonderland
description: In Victorian England a bored young girl dreams that she has entered a fantasy world called Wonderland populated by fantastical characters.

title: Vampire Bat, The
description: When corpses drained of blood begin to show up in a European village, vampirism is suspected to be responsible.

title: 42nd Street
description: When the leading lady of a Broadway musical breaks her ankle, she is replaced by a young unknown actress, who becomes the star of the show.

title: Day of Reckoning
description: John and Dorothy are happily married for 4 years when he's suddenly arrested for stealing money, which he did to support his wife's high tastes. George hires a lawyer for John to see that he gets prison time so he can movie in on ...

title: Duck Soup
description: Rufus T. Firefly is named the dictator of bankrupt Freedonia and declares war on neighboring Sylvania over the love of his wealthy backer Mrs. Teasdale, contending with two inept spies who can't seem to keep straight which side th...

title: Tomorrow at Seven
description: People in an old, dark mansion are menaced by a maniac called "The Black Ace."

title: Gold Diggers of 1933
description: A wealthy composer rescues unemployed Broadway performers with a new play, but insists on remaining anonymous.

title: Female
description: Alison Drake, the tough-minded executive of an automobile factory, succeeds in the man's world of business until she meets an independent design engineer.

title: A Study in Scarlet
description: Holmes and Watson investigate a secret society with members who keep dying.

title: Peanut Vendor, The
description: A monkey sings about how he is selling peanuts and how he's only there for a limited time so he tells everyone to by them before they go to sleep

title: Invisible Man, The
description: A scientist finds a way of becoming invisible, but in doing so, he becomes murderously insane.

title: Baby Face
description: A young woman who has been abused by men all her life decides to turn the tables and exploit her hapless colleagues at a big-city bank to make a cozy life for herself.

title: Design for Living
description: A woman cannot decide between two men who love her, and the trio agree to try living together in a platonic friendly relationship.

title: Cavalcade

title: Sons of the Desert
description: When Stan and Ollie trick their wives into thinking that they are taking a medicinal cruise while they're actually going to a convention, the wives find out the truth the hard way.

title: Cat's-Paw, The

title: Scarlet Empress, The

title: Painted Veil, The
description: A wife neglected by her husband, a medical researcher in China, falls in love with a dashing diplomatic attaché.

title: Count of Monte Cristo, The
description: After greedy men have Edmond Dantes unjustly imprisoned for 20 years for innocently delivering a letter entrusted to him, he escapes to get his revenge on them.

title: Cleopatra
description: The man-hungry Queen of Egypt leads Julius Caesar and Marc Antony astray, amid scenes of DeMillean splendor.

title: Of Human Bondage
description: A young man finds himself attracted to a cold, unfeeling waitress who might ultimately destroy them both.

title: L'atalante
description: Newly married couple Juliette and a ship captain Jean struggle through marriage as they travel on the L'atalante along with the captain's first mate Le père Jules and a cabin boy.

title: Lost Patrol, The
description: A dozen British soldiers, lost in a Mesopotamian desert during World War I, are menaced by unseen Arab enemies.

title: Spitfire
description: A story about a savage girl in an American outback who is suspected of witchcraft.

title: Maniac
description: A former vaudevillian gifted at impersonation assists a mad scientist in reanimating corpses and soon goes mad himself.

title: Anne of Green Gables
description: A romantic teenage girl is adopted by a pair of elderly siblings in turn-of-the-century Canada.

title: Lost in the Stratosphere
description: Two military pilots are close friends, and share in a lot of hazardous missions while engaging in a series of good-natured romantic rivalries.

title: Search for Beauty
description: Three con artists dupe two Olympians into serving as editors of a new health and beauty magazine which is only a front for salacious stories and pictures.

title: Evelyn Prentice
description: The neglected wife of a high profile attorney dallies with a unscrupulous womanizer and finds herself involved in blackmail and murder.

title: Man Who Knew Too Much, The
description: An ordinary British couple vacationing in Switzerland suddenly find themselves embroiled in a case of international intrigue when their daughter is kidnapped by spies plotting a political assassination.

title: Imitation of Life
description: A struggling widow and her daughter take in a Black housekeeper and her fair-skinned daughter; the two women start a successful business but face familial, identity, and racial issues along the way.

title: Mystery Liner
description: Police try to solve a murder on board an ocean liner.

title: It's a Gift
description: A henpecked New Jersey grocer makes plans to move to California to grow oranges, despite the resistance of his overbearing wife.

title: Top Hat
description: An American dancer comes to Britain and falls for a model whom he initially annoyed, but she mistakes him for his goofy producer.

title: 39 Steps, The
description: A man in London tries to help a counter-espionage agent, but when the agent is killed and the man stands accused, he must go on the run to save himself and stop a spy ring that is trying to steal top-secret information.

title: Anna Karenina
description: The married Anna Karenina falls in love with Count Vronsky despite her husband's refusal to grant a divorce, and both must contend with the social repercussions.

title: Mutiny on the Bounty
description: First mate Fletcher Christian leads a revolt against his sadistic commander, Captain Bligh, in this classic seafaring adventure, based on the real-life 1789 mutiny.

title: Naughty Marietta
description: In order to avoid a prearranged marriage, a rebellious French princess sheds her identity and escapes to colonial New Orleans, where she finds an unlikely true love.

title: Roberta
description: An American jazzman and his buddy woo a Russian princess and a fake countess in Paris.

title: Magnificent Obsession
description: A wealthy survivor of a hospital crisis later falls for a deceased doctor's blind widow. Inspired by the doctor's charitable values, he secretly aids her, studies medicine, and performs her sight-saving surgery.

title: A Night At The Opera
description: A sly business manager and the wacky friends of two opera singers in Italy help them achieve success in America while humiliating their stuffy and snobbish enemies.

title: Bride of Frankenstein, The

title: Lady in Scarlet, The
description: When a wealthy art dealer is murdered, the private investigator hired for the case discovers a web of blackmail, corruption and stolen bonds.

title: Riverside Murder, The

title: Mad Love
description: In Paris, a demented surgeon's obsession with a British actress leads him to secretly replace her concert-pianist husband's mangled hands with those of a guillotined murderer with a gift for knife-throwing.

title: Swing Time
description: Roguish gambler/dancer "Lucky" Garnett is challenged by his fiance's father to come up with $25,000 to prove he's worthy of her hand. But after he falls in love with a dance instructor, Lucky'll do anything to keep from earning th...

title: Modern Times
description: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

title: Charge of the Light Brigade, The
description: A major countermands orders and attacks to avenge a previous massacre of men, women, and children.

title: San Francisco
description: A Barbary Coast saloonkeeper and a Nob Hill impresario are rivals for the affections of a beautiful singer, both personally and professionally, in 1906 San Francisco.

title: Wife vs. Secretary
description: The wife of a publishing executive mistakenly believes that her husband's relationship with his attractive secretary is more than professional.

title: Petrified Forest, The
description: A waitress, a hobo and a bank robber get mixed up at a lonely diner in the desert.

title: Mr. Deeds Goes to Town
description: A unassuming greeting card poet from a small town in Vermont heads to New York City upon inheriting a massive fortune and is immediately hounded by those who wish to take advantage of him.

title: Born to Dance
description: On leave, a sailor falls in love with a young lady aspiring to become a Broadway dancer, but their relationship is jeopardized by an established Broadway star, who is also enamored by him.

title: Revolt of the Zombies
description: An international expedition is sent into Cambodia to destroy an ancient formula that turns men into zombies.

title: Earthworm Tractors
description: Alexander is trying to make a big sale of Earthworm tractors to grouchy lumberman Johnson. Since Alexander doesn't really know anything about tractors and since Johnson is opposed to tractors of any kind, it isn't going to be an e...

title: Osaka Elegy
description: A young woman becomes a mistress of her boss in order to support her family.

title: Theodora Goes Wild
description: The author of a controversially racy best-selling book tries to hide her celebrity status from her provincial small-town neighbors, who would be scandalized if they knew.

title: Great Ziegfeld, The
description: The ups and downs of Florenz Ziegfeld Jr., famed producer of extravagant stage revues, are portrayed.

title: Mandarin Mystery, The
description: Two murders are committed and a $50,000 Chinese Mandarin stamp is stolen, passed around and eventually recovered as a group of valuable stamp counterfeiters is uncovered, through the investigations of Ellery Queen.

title: Only Son, The
description: A widow sends her only son away to receive a better education. Years later, she visits him, finding him a poor school teacher with a wife and son.

title: Camille
description: A Parisian courtesan must choose between the young man who loves her and the callous baron who wants her, even as her own health begins to fail.

title: Pennies from Heaven
description: Larry Poole, in prison on a false charge, promise an inmate that when he gets out he will look up and help out a family. The family turns out to be a young girl, Patsy Smith, and her elderly grandfather who need lots of help.

title: Romeo and Juliet
description: Young love is poisoned by a generations long feud between two noble families.

title: Bullets or Ballots
description: When a crusader against rackets is murdered, a grand jury battles the rackets by promoting McLaren to be in charge of the cleanup. He fires NYPD Detective Blake, who punches him and joins the racket.

title: My Man Godfrey
description: A scatterbrained socialite hires a vagrant as a family butler - but there's more to Godfrey than meets the eye.

title: Sabotage
description: A Scotland Yard undercover detective is on the trail of a saboteur who is part of a plot to set off a bomb in London. But when the detective's cover is blown, the plot begins to unravel.

title: Fury
description: When a wrongly-accused prisoner barely survives a lynch-mob attack and is presumed dead, he vindictively decides to fake his death and frame the mob for his supposed murder.

title: Murder at Glen Athol
description: A famous detective is invited to a swanky party at an elegant mansion, but before the night is over he finds himself involved with gangsters, blackmail and murder.

title: Il caso Valdemar
description: A doctor performs an experiment on a dying man by placing him under hypnosis on his deathbed.

title: These Three
description: Two schoolteachers and the man they both love face ruin when a malicious student cooks up a lie.

title: Secret Agent
description: After three British Agents are assigned to assassinate a mysterious German spy during World War I, two of them become ambivalent when their duty to the mission conflicts with their consciences.

title: Dracula's Daughter

title: Shall We Dance
description: A ballet dancer and a showgirl fake a marriage for publicity purposes, then fall in love.

title: Stage Door
description: A chronicle of the ambitions, dreams, and disappointments of aspiring actresses who all live in the same boarding house.

title: Stella Dallas
description: A working-class woman is willing to do whatever it takes to give her daughter a socially promising future.

title: Conquest
description: A Polish countess becomes Napoleon Bonaparte's mistress at the urging of Polish leaders who feel she could influence him to make Poland independent.

title: Topper
description: A fun-loving couple, finding that they died and are now ghosts, decide to shake up the stuffy lifestyle of a friend of theirs.

title: Lost Horizon
description: When a revered diplomat's plane is diverted and crashes in the peaks of Tibet, he and the other survivors are guided to an isolated monastery at Shangri-La, where they wrestle with the invitation to stay.

title: Prisoner of Zenda, The
description: An Englishman on a Ruritarian holiday must impersonate the king when the rightful monarch, a distant cousin, is drugged and kidnapped.

title: Knight Without Armor
description: After two years as a Czarist British agent posing as a Russian Commissar, he rescues a Russian countess from her Bolshevik captors.

title: Parnell
description: The life of Irish politician Charles Stewart Parnell, following from 1880 onward his struggle to secure Home Rule, pursued in prison, Parliament, and elsewhere. Emphasis is on the relationship with married Katie O'Shea which threa...

title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
description: Exiled into the dangerous forest by her wicked stepmother, a princess is rescued by seven dwarf miners who make her part of their household.

title: A Day at the Races
description: A veterinarian posing as a doctor teams with a singer and his friends as they struggle to save an upstate New York sanitarium with the help of a misfit racehorse.

title: Nothing Sacred
description: An eccentric woman learns she is not dying of radium poisoning as earlier assumed, but when she meets a reporter looking for a story, she feigns sickness again for her own profit.

title: Make Way for Tomorrow

title: Murder at the Baskervilles (Silver Blaze)
description: Sherlock Holmes takes a vacation and visits his old friend Sir Henry Baskerville. His vacation ends when he suddenly finds himself in the middle of a double-murder mystery. Now he's got to find Professor Moriarty and the horse Sil...

title: Pepe le Moko
description: A wanted gangster is both king and prisoner of the Casbah. He's protected from arrest by his friends, but is torn by his desire for freedom. A visiting Parisian beauty may determine his fate.

title: Awful Truth, The
description: A married couple files an amicable divorce, but find letting go of each other harder than they originally thought.

title: Girl Was Young, The
description: A man on the run from a murder charge enlists the help of a beautiful stranger who must put herself at risk for his cause.

title: Marked Woman
description: A crusading district attorney persuades a clip joint hostess to testify against her mobster boss after her innocent sister is accidentally murdered during one of his unsavory parties.

title: Bizarre, Bizarre
description: In Victorian London, a crime novelist and his wife fake their disappearance in order to hide from an uptight Anglican bishop who is leading a campaign against the "evils" of crime fiction.

description: The biopic of the famous French muckraking writer and his involvement in fighting the injustice of the Dreyfus Affair.

title: Wee Willie Winkie
description: Priscilla Williams, a young girl living with her widowed mother and paternal grandfather at the post he commands in northern India, becomes enamored of military life and embroiled in brewing rebellion against the crown in the earl...

title: Captains Courageous
description: A spoiled brat who falls overboard from a steamship in the 1920s gets picked up by a New England fishing boat, where he's made to earn his keep by joining the crew in their work.

title: Carefree
description: A psychiatrist falls in love with the woman he's supposed to be nudging into marriage with someone else.

title: Lady Vanishes, The
description: While travelling in continental Europe, a rich young playgirl realizes that an elderly lady seems to have disappeared from the train.

description: A young man in love with a girl from a rich family finds his unorthodox plan to go on holiday for the early years of his life met with skepticism by everyone except for his fiancée's eccentric sister and long-suffering brother.

title: Dawn Patrol, The
description: British flying aces in World War I contend with the harsh realities of war.

title: Jezebel
description: In 1850s Louisiana, a free-spirited Southern belle loses her fiancé due to her stubborn vanity and pride, and vows to win him back.

title: Boys Town
description: When a death row prisoner tells him he wouldn't have led a life of crime if only he had had one friend as a child, Father Edward Flanagan decides to start a home for young boys.

title: Mr. Wong, Detective
description: San Francisco Detective Wong is contacted by Dayton, who fears for his life. When Wong arrives at Dayton Chemical Co. the next day, he finds him dead.

title: Adventures of Robin Hood, The
description: When Prince John and the Norman Lords begin oppressing the Saxon masses in King Richard's absence in 1190s England, a Saxon lord fights back as the outlaw leader of a resistance movement.

title: Bluebeard's Eighth Wife
description: After learning her multi-millionaire fiancé has already been married seven times, the daughter of a penniless marquis decides to tame him.

title: Bringing Up Baby
description: While trying to secure a $1 million donation for his museum, a befuddled paleontologist is pursued by a flighty and often irritating heiress and her pet leopard, Baby.

description: A musician is blessed with four musical prodigies, all girls, and cursed when a troubled young composer enters the lives of his daughters.

title: Mad Miss Manton, The
description: After the murdered body discovered by beautiful, vivacious socialite Melsa Manton disappears, police and press label her a prankster until she proves them wrong.

title: Baker's Wife, The

title: Angels with Dirty Faces
description: A priest tries to stop a gangster from corrupting a group of street kids.

title: Wizard of Oz, The
description: Young Dorothy Gale and her dog Toto are swept away by a tornado from their Kansas farm to the magical Land of Oz and embark on a quest with three new friends to see the Wizard, who can return her to her home and fulfill the others...

description: A study of the lives and romantic entanglements of various interconnected women.

title: Stagecoach

title: Wuthering Heights

description: An aged teacher and former headmaster of a boarding school recalls his career and his personal life over the decades.

title: Young Mr. Lincoln

title: Drums Along the Mohawk

description: In 15th-century France, a gypsy girl is framed for murder by the infatuated Chief Justice, and only the deformed bellringer of Notre Dame Cathedral can save her.

description: The Marx Brothers try to help the owner of a circus recover some stolen funds before he finds himself out of a job.

title: Gorilla, The

title: Of Mice and Men
description: A mentally disabled giant and his level headed guardian find work at a sadistic cowboy's ranch in depression era America.

title: Rules of the Game, The
description: A bourgeois life in France at the onset of World War II, as the rich and their poor servants meet up at a French chateau.

title: Babes in Arms
description: A group of vaudevillians struggling to compete with talkies hits the road hoping for a comeback. Frustrated to be left behind, all of their kids put on a show themselves to raise money for the families and to prove they've got tal...

title: Destry Rides Again
description: Deputy sheriff Destry tames the town of Bottle Neck, including saloon singer Frenchy.

title: Nancy Drew... Reporter
description: Nancy Drew, contest-reporter for the local newspaper, clears a young woman of murder charges.

title: Adventures of Sherlock Holmes, The
description: The master sleuth hunts his archenemy, Professor Moriarty, who is planning the crime of the century.

title: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
description: A naive youth leader is appointed to fill a vacancy in the U.S. Senate. His idealistic plans promptly collide with corruption at home and subterfuge from his hero in Washington, but he tries to forge ahead despite attacks on his c...

title: Jamaica Inn
description: In Cornwall, 1819, a young woman discovers she's living near a gang of criminals who arrange shipwrecks for profit.

title: Le jour se lève
description: After committing a murder, a man locks himself in his apartment and recollects the events that led him to the killing.

title: Gulliver's Travels
description: A doctor washes ashore on an island inhabited by little people.

title: Love Affair
description: A French playboy and an American former nightclub singer fall in love aboard a ship.

title: Hound of the Baskervilles, The
description: Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson investigate the legend of a supernatural hound, a beast that may be stalking a young heir on the fog-shrouded moorland that makes up his estate.

title: Rebecca
description: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

description: As a reward for capturing a bank robber, Stan and Ollie get scholarships to Oxford, but are met with resentment by other students.

title: Ape, The
description: Dr. Bernard Adrian is a kindly mad scientist who seeks to cure a young woman's polio. He needs spinal fluid from a human to complete the formula for his experimental serum.

description: In 1854, Jeb Stuart, George Custer and other graduates from West Point are posted to Kansas to help pacify the territory before railroad construction to Santa Fe can resume.

description: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

description: The arrival of wealthy bachelors in town causes an uproar when families with single daughters aggressively seek engagements, including the Bennet family, with five eligible daughters.

description: A young woman from a family of prostitutes falls in love with a hard-working man, but after he finds out the truth about her background, their romance becomes jeopardized.

description: A murder is found to be connected to a false heir and a secret underground torture chamber.

description: After a troupe of danseuses becomes unemployed, one of them takes up burlesque dancing while another dreams of performing ballet.

title: Fantasia

title: Anne Of Windy Poplars
description: Anne Shirley, now betrothed to her childhood sweetheart Gilbert Blythe, takes a teaching position in a prestigious school far from her home on Prince Edward Island. While she is quickly accepted by her host family, the rest of the...

description: Twenty years after the murder of Alice Barlow, her house is finally occupied again. However, the husband from the couple who has moved in has a secret that he will do anything to keep hidden.

title: Last Alarm, The
description: A veteran firefighter is forced to retire at age 65 by the Fire Department.

description: On the eve of World War II, a young American reporter tries to expose enemy agents in London.

description: Two employees at a gift shop can barely stand each other, without realizing that they are falling in love through the post as each other's anonymous pen pal.

description: The story of legendary Notre Dame football player and coach Knute Rockne.

description: In Shanghai, dragon lady 'Mother' Gin Sling operates a gambling house for wealthy patrons but she clashes with influential land developer Sir Guy Charteris who wants to put her out of business.

description: The happy tranquility of Buggsville is shattered when the populace learns that a colossal skyscraper is to be built over their tiny town.

description: After being released from prison, notorious thief Roy Earle is hired by his old boss to help a group of inexperienced criminals plan and carry out the robbery of a California resort.

title: Wolf Man, The

description: Dedicated Midwestern teacher Ella Bishop is distressed when her fiancé runs off with her vixenish cousin Amy. After Amy dies in childbirth, Ella is left to care for Amy's daughter Hope.

title: Men of Boys Town
description: Boys Town faces financial struggles as Father Flanagan helps troubled boys from a reform school lacking proper facilities. Father Flanagan and the school take efforts to reform and educate the new arrivals, teaching them they can ...

title: 49th Parallel
description: A World War II U-boat crew are stranded in northern Canada. To avoid internment, they must make their way to the border and get into the still-neutral U.S.

title: Buck Privates
description: Two sidewalk salesman enlist in the army in order to avoid jail, only to find that their drill instructor is the police officer who tried having them imprisoned.

title: Hold That Ghost
description: After inheriting a fortune from a gangster, two dim-witted service station attendants find themselves stranded in a haunted house.

title: Murder by Invitation
description: A wealthy woman has a murder mystery on her hands when her greedy relatives wind up dead after being invited to her home.

title: Suspicion
description: A shy young heiress marries a charming gentleman, and soon begins to suspect he is planning to murder her.

title: Sun valley serenade

description: On a spooky island, three stranded travelers find an evil doctor working with foreign spies and in control of zombies.

title: Ball of Fire

description: A frumpy spinster blossoms under therapy and becomes an elegant, independent woman.

title: Casablanca

title: Magnificent Ambersons, The
description: The spoiled young heir to the decaying Amberson fortune comes between his widowed mother and the man she has always loved.

title: Bambi
description: The story of a young deer growing up in the forest.

title: Son of Fury: The Story of Benjamin Blake
description: Cheated out of his estate by his sadistic uncle, young Benjamin Blake goes to the South Seas to make his fortune so he can return to claim his birthright.

title: For Me and My Gal
description: Two vaudeville performers fall in love, but find their relationship tested by the arrival of WWI.

title: I Married an Angel
description: A count who ignores an infatuated secretary thinks he has met his match when an angel from Heaven shows up.

title: Cat People
description: An American man marries a Serbian immigrant who fears that she will turn into the cat person of her homeland's fables if they are intimate together.

title: Black Dragons
description: A cabal of American industrialists, all fifth-columnists intent on sabotaging the war effort, are methodically murdered by the malevolent Monsieur Colomb. It is only until detective Dick Martin is assigned to the case that everyon...

title: There Was a Father
description: A schoolteacher struggles to raise his son Ryohei by himself, having neither money nor future prospects.

title: Tales of Manhattan
description: A formal tailcoat that gets passed from one owner to another affects each life in a significant way.

title: Man Who Came to Dinner, The
description: An acerbic critic wreaks havoc when a hip injury forces him to move in with a Midwestern family.

title: Woman of the Year
description: Sportswriter Sam Craig and columnist Tess Harding, with the same New York newspaper, overcome their initial antagonism, fall in love and get married, only to find their relationship strained when he comes to resent her hectic life...

description: During the German occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.

title: Sherlock Holmes and the Secret Weapon
description: Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson must protect a Swiss inventor of an advanced bomb sight from falling into German hands.

title: Saboteur
description: A young man accused of sabotage goes on the run to prove his innocence.

title: Saboteur
description: A young man accused of sabotage goes on the run to prove his innocence.

title: Mrs. Miniver
description: A British family struggles to survive the first months of World War II.

title: Saludos Amigos
description: Disney animators tour South America and present four animated shorts inspired by their trip.

title: Corpse Vanishes, The
description: A scientist, aided by an old hag and her two sons, kills virginal brides, steals their bodies, and extracts gland fluid to keep his ancient wife alive and young.

title: Gay Sisters, The
description: Three wealthy orphans attempt to defend their ownership of their family's property, but financial and romantic problems set in.

title: Old Acquaintance
description: Old friends Kit Marlowe and Millie Drake adopt contrasting lifestyles: Kit is a single, critically acclaimed author while married Millie writes popular pulp novels.

title: Watch on the Rhine
description: A German-born engineer, his American wife and their children travel from Mexico to the United States to visit her family, but a Romanian count complicates their plans.

title: Girl Crazy
description: A philandering young playboy is sent to college somewhere in the American West, and organizes a show, together with his sweetheart, to save the college from closure due to falling enrollments.

title: I Walked with a Zombie
description: A nurse is hired to care for the wife of a sugar plantation owner, who has been acting strangely, on a Caribbean island.

title: Sky's the Limit, The
description: Fred Atwell sneaks away from his famous squadron's personal appearance tour and goes incognito for several days off.

title: Sahara
description: After the fall of Tobruk in 1942, during the Allied retreat in the Libyan desert, an American tank picks-up a motley group of survivors but they face advancing Germans and a lack of water.

title: Guadalcanal Diary
description: The story of a large U.S. Marines invasion task force bound for Guadalcanal in the Solomon Islands in 1942.

title: Tender Comrade
description: Jo Jones, a young defense plant worker whose husband is in the military during World War II, shares a house with three other women in the same situation.

title: Day of Wrath
description: The young wife of an aging priest falls in love with his son amidst the horror of a merciless witch hunt in 17th century Denmark.

title: Life and Death of Colonel Blimp, The

title: Le Corbeau: The Raven
