title: Shadow of a Doubt
description: A teenage girl, overjoyed when her uncle comes to visit the family in their quiet California town, slowly begins to suspect that he is the "Merry Widow" killer sought by the authorities.

title: Judo Saga (Sanshiro Sugata)
description: Sugata, a young man, struggles to learn the nuance and meaning of judo, and in doing so comes to learn something of the meaning of life.

title: Cry 'Havoc'
description: A chronicle of the experiences of a mixed group of Army hospital volunteers stationed in Bataan during World War II.

title: Fires Were Started
description: A tale of firefighters in London during the Blitz.

title: Ox-Bow Incident, The
description: Walter Van Tilburg Clark's novel inspires an account of a lynch mob that seeks revenge for a rancher's murder.

title: So Proudly We Hail!
description: A group of nurses returning from the war in the Philippines recall their experiences in combat and in love.

title: Jane Eyre
description: After a harsh childhood, orphan Jane Eyre is hired by Edward Rochester, the brooding lord of a mysterious manor house, to care for his young daughter.

title: More the Merrier, The
description: During the World War II housing shortage in Washington, two men and a woman share a single apartment and the older man plays Cupid to the other two.

title: La main du diable
description: Roland buys a severed hand talisman for a nickel, gaining love, wealth and fame. After a year of success, the devil appears to collect payment.

title: Angels of Sin
description: Anne-Marie joins a Dominican convent as a novice where she knows Therese. After shooting a man for which she was imprisoned, Therese protests her innocence, reluctant to tell her secret.

title: Seventh Victim, The
description: A woman in search of her missing sister uncovers a Satanic cult in New York's Greenwich Village and finds that they could have something to do with her sibling's random disappearance.

title: China
description: During the Japanese invasion of China, a cynical, macho profiteer meets a compassionate, beautiful schoolteacher.

title: Ossessione
description: Gino, a drifter, begins an affair with inn-owner Giovanna, and they plan to get rid of her older husband.

title: Millions Like Us
description: A young woman called into service at a factory during World War II falls in love with a member of the RAF.

title: Heaven Can Wait
description: An old roué arrives in Hades to review his life with Satan, who will rule on his eligibility to enter the Underworld.

title: Arsenic and Old Lace
description: Mortimer Brewster, a Brooklyn writer of books on the futility of marriage, risks his reputation after he decides to tie the knot. Things grow complicated when he learns that his beloved maiden aunts Abby and Martha are serial murd...

title: Double Indemnity
description: An insurance representative is seduced by a dissatisfied housewife into a scheme of insurance fraud and murder that arouses the suspicion of his colleague, a claims investigator.

title: Mr. Skeffington
description: Popular and beautiful Fanny Trellis enters into a loveless marriage with an older man, Jewish banker Job Skeffington, in order to save her beloved brother Trippy from an embezzlement charge.

title: Meet Me in St. Louis
description: Young love and childish fears highlight a year in the life of a turn-of-the-century family.

title: Hail the Conquering Hero

title: Torment
description: An idealistic adolescent suffering under the thumb of a sadistic schoolmaster falls in love with a loose girl who is bullied and tormented by another lover.

title: Window in the Window
description: A reserved professor meets a model and gets mixed up in murder.

title: Laura
description: A police detective falls in love with the woman whose murder he is investigating.

title: Cover Girl
description: Rusty Parker wins a contest and becomes a celebrated cover girl; this endangers her romance with dancing mentor Danny.

title: Since You Went Away
description: With her husband away to fight in World War II, a housewife must care for their two daughters alone.

title: To Have and Have Not
description: During World War II, an American expatriate helps transport a French Resistance leader and his wife to Martinique while romancing a lounge singer.

title: I'll Be Seeing You
description: A soldier suffering from combat fatigue meets a young woman on Christmas furlough from prison and their mutual loneliness blossoms into romance.

title: National Velvet
description: A jaded former jockey helps a young girl prepare a wild but gifted horse for England's Grand National Sweepstakes.

title: Most Beautiful (Ichiban utsukushiku), The
description: World War II film about female volunteer workers at an optics plant who do their best to meet production targets.

title: Lifeboat
description: Several survivors of a torpedoed merchant ship in World War II find themselves in the same lifeboat with one of the crew members of the U-boat that sank their ship.

title: Three Caballeros, The
description: Donald receives his birthday gifts, which include traditional gifts and information about Brazil (hosted by Zé Carioca) and Mexico (by Panchito, a Mexican Charro Rooster).

title: Minstrel Man
description: The story of a singer in a minstrel show, from his career highs to the tragedies in his personal life.

title: A Canterbury Tale
description: Three World War Two era pilgrims investigate a bizarre crime in a small UK town while on their way to Canterbury.

title: Uninvited, The

description: Fictionalized story of British aerospace engineers solving the problem of supersonic flight.

title: Ivanhoe
description: A knight seeks to free the captive King Richard and put him back on the throne.

title: Julius Caesar
description: The growing ambition of Julius Caesar is a source of major concern to his close friend Brutus. Cassius persuades him to participate in his plot to assassinate Caesar but they have both sorely underestimated Mark Antony.

title: Peter Pan
description: Wendy and her brothers are whisked away to the magical world of Neverland with the hero of their stories, Peter Pan.

title: Le Salaire de la Peur
description: In a decrepit South American village, four men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.

title: Roman holiday
description: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

title: Mogambo
description: On a Kenyan safari, white hunter Victor Marswell has a love triangle with seductive American socialite Eloise Kelly and anthropologist Donald Nordley's cheating wife Linda.

title: Tokyo Story
description: An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city, but receive little attention.

title: Band Wagon, The
description: An aging movie star uncertain of his future teams up with a top ballerina to headline a new Broadway musical, but the pretentiously artistic goals of its director threaten to change it beyond recognition.

title: Stalag 17
description: After two American prisoners are killed by the guards in the act of escaping from a German P.O.W. camp in World War II, the barracks black marketeer, J.J. Sefton, is suspected of being an informer.

title: War of the Worlds, The
description: A small town in California is attacked by Martians, beginning a worldwide invasion.

title: Calamity Jane
description: The story of Calamity Jane, her saloon, and her romance with Wild Bill Hickok.

title: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
description: Showgirls Lorelei Lee and Dorothy Shaw travel to Paris, pursued by a private detective hired by the suspicious father of Lorelei's fiancé, as well as a rich, enamored old man and many other doting admirers.

title: Cruel Sea, The

title: Miss Sadie Thompson
description: A self-righteous missionary man seeks to save the soul of a former prostitute.

title: Salome
description: After her banishment from Rome, Jewish Princess Salome returns to her Roman-ruled native land of Galilee, where prophet John the Baptist preaches against Salome's parents, King Herod and Queen Herodias.

title: Shane

title: Mesa of Lost Women

description: At a U.S. Army base in 1941 Hawaii, a pugilistic private is cruelly punished for refusing to join his unit's boxing team. Meanwhile, his commanding officer's wife and top NCO are indulging in a torrid love affair.

title: Hitch-Hiker, The
description: Two friends pick up a psychopathic escaped convict who tells them that he intends to murder them when the ride is over.

title: I Confess
description: A priest who comes under suspicion for murder cannot clear his name without breaking the seal of the confessional.

title: Big Heat, The
description: Tough, yet unscrupulous, police detective Dave Bannion takes on a crime syndicate with powerful political ties.

title: How to Marry a Millionaire
description: Three women set out to find eligible millionaires to marry, but find true love in the process.

title: Fear and Desire
description: Four soldiers trapped behind enemy lines must confront their fears and desires.

title: Pickup on South Street
description: A pickpocket unwittingly lifts a message destined for enemy agents and becomes a target for a Communist spy ring.

title: Mr. Hulot's Holiday
description: Monsieur Hulot comes to a beachside hotel for a vacation and accidentally, but good-naturedly, causes havoc.

title: Ugetsu
description: A tale of ambition, family, love, and war set in the midst of the Japanese Civil Wars of the sixteenth century.

title: Summer with Monika
description: A pair of teenagers meet one summer day, start a reckless affair and abandon their families to be with one another.

title: Glen or Glenda
description: A psychiatrist tells the stories of a transvestite (Glen or Glenda) and a pseudohermaphrodite (Alan or Anne).

title: Wild One, The
description: Two rival motorcycle gangs terrorize a small town after one of their leaders is thrown in jail.

title: Beast from 20,000 Fathoms, The
description: A ferocious dinosaur awakened by an Arctic atomic test terrorizes the North Atlantic and, ultimately, New York City.

title: Inferno
description: A tough, hard-driving business tycoon suffers a broken leg and is left to die in the desert by his scheming wife and her greedy lover.

description: A young boy dreams that he is in an imaginary world where, assisted by his family's plumber, he must save other piano-playing kids like himself from the dungeons of his dictatorial piano teacher who also mind-controls his mother.

title: It Came from Outer Space
description: A spaceship from another world crashes in the Arizona desert and only an amateur stargazer and a schoolteacher suspect alien influence when the local townsfolk begin to act strangely.

title: earrings of Madame de..., The
description: When an aristocratic woman known only as "Madame de . . ." sells a pair of earrings given to her by her husband in order to pay some debts, she sets off a chain reaction of financial and carnal consequences that can end only in de...

title: House of Wax
description: An associate burns down a wax museum with the owner inside, but he survives only to become vengeful and murderous.

title: Tarzan and the She-Devil
description: Ivory poachers, headed by Lyra the She-Devil, Vargo and Fidel, capture a native tribe to carry their loot. Tarzan intervenes and is captured.

title: Cat Women of the Moon
description: Astronauts travel to the moon where they discover it is inhabited by attractive young women in black tights.

title: Man Between, The
description: In post-WW2 Berlin, when travel to the East was still possible, the sister of a British officer from West Berlin is abducted by Communist agents and taken into the Soviet sector where her eventual rescue is arranged by a German sm...

title: Naked Spur, The
description: A bounty hunter trying to bring a murderer to justice is forced to accept the help of two less-than-trustworthy strangers.

title: Phffft
description: While pursuing new love interests, a former married couple keep running into each other all over town.

title: Touchez pas au grisbi
description: An aging, world-weary gangster is double-crossed and forced out of retirement when his best friend is kidnapped and their stash of eight stolen gold bars demanded as ransom.

description: When a backwoodsman in 1850s Oregon brings a wife home to his farm, his six brothers decide that they want to get married too.

title: White Christmas
description: A successful song-and-dance team become romantically involved with a sister act and team up to save the failing Vermont inn of their former commanding general.

title: Johnny Guitar
description: After helping a wounded gang member, a strong-willed female saloon owner is wrongly suspected of murder and bank robbery by a lynch mob.

description: An ex-prize fighter turned New Jersey longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses, including his older brother, as he starts to connect with the grieving sister of one of the syndicate's victims.

description: A ship sent to investigate a wave of mysterious sinkings encounters the advanced submarine, the Nautilus, commanded by Captain Nemo.

title: Rear Window
description: A bored photographer recovering from a broken leg passes the time by watching his neighbors and begins to suspect one of them of murder.

title: Them!
description: The earliest atomic tests in New Mexico cause common ants to mutate into giant man-eating monsters that threaten civilization.

title: Sabrina
description: After her return from school in Paris, a playboy finally takes notice of his family's chauffeur's daughter, who's long had a crush on him, but he questions his more serious brother's motives when he warns against getting involved ...

title: Hobson's Choice

title: Knock on Wood
description: Discovering that a ventriloquist is travelling to Zurich, a spy ring hides secret plans in his dummies' heads. When a second spy ring learns of the plans, they descend upon the ventriloquist, causing city-wide pandemonium.

description: A London playboy plots the perfect murder of his rich, unfaithful wife.

title: Shichinin no samurai

title: A Star Is Born
description: A fading matinee idol helps a young singer and actress find fame, even as age and alcoholism send his own career on a downward spiral.

title: Executive Suite
description: When the head of a large manufacturing firm dies suddenly from a stroke, his vice presidents vie to see who will replace him.

title: Journey to Italy
description: An unhappily married couple attempts to find direction and insight while vacationing in Naples.

title: Glenn Miller Story, The
description: Biography of bandleader Glenn Miller from his beginnings to his death over the English Channel in December 1944.

title: Three Coins in the Fountain
description: Three American women working in Rome, Italy share a spacious apartment and the desire to find love and marriage. Each one experiences a few bumps in her journey to romance.

title: Late Chrysanthemuns
description: What is the life of a Geisha like once her beauty has faded and she has retired? Kin has saved her money, and has become a wealthy money-lender, spending her days cold-heartedly collecting debts. Even her best friends, Tomi, Nobu,...

title: Creature from the Black Lagoon
description: A strange prehistoric beast lurks in the depths of the Amazonian jungle. A group of scientists try to capture the animal and bring it back to civilization for study.

title: Attila
description: Attila, the leader of the barbarian Huns and called by the Romans "The Scourge of God", sweeps onto the Italian peninsula, defeating all of the armies of Rome, until he and his men reach the gates of the city itself.

description: After a dinosaur-like beast - awoken from undersea hibernation by atom bomb testing - ravages Tokyo, a scientist must decide if his similarly dangerous weapon should be used to destroy it.

title: Animal Farm
description: A successful farmyard revolution by the resident animals vs. the farmer goes horribly wrong when the victors create a new tyranny among themselves.

title: Uwasa no onna
description: Yukiko's mother runs a lodging house for courtesans in Kyoto. When her fiance learns this, he ends their engagement. Yukiko despises what her mother does until one of her mother's clients shows interest in her and starts to woo her.

title: Comicos
description: Ana Ruiz, a young actress who works in a traveling theater company, performs only small roles, but she hopes to succeed and puts her success before the love of Miguel. When the company decides to release "Heaven is not far" by Ern...

title: An American in Rome
description: Nando Moriconi is a young Italian living in Rome. He is fond for everything coming from the United States. He tries to speak American-English, to wear clothes he thinks Americans wear, to walk like John Wayne, and to eat cornflake...

title: Carmen Jones
description: Contemporary version of the Bizet opera, with new lyrics and an African-American cast.

title: Miseria e nobilta

title: Caine Mutiny, The

title: Senso

title: Night of the Hunter, The
description: A self-proclaimed preacher marries a gullible widow whose young children are reluctant to tell him where their real dad hid the $10,000 he'd stolen in a robbery.

title: Lady and the Tramp
description: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

title: Daddy Long Legs
description: A wealthy American has a chance encounter with a joyful young French woman, and anonymously pays for her education. She writes letters to her mysterious benefactor, nicknaming him from the description given by some of her fellow o...

title: Sommarnattens leende (Smiles of a Summer Night)
description: In Sweden at the turn of the century, members of the upper class and their servants find themselves in a romantic tangle that they try to work out amidst jealousy and heartbreak.

title: Ladykillers, The
description: Five oddball criminals planning a bank robbery rent rooms on a cul-de-sac from an octogenarian widow under the pretext that they are classical musicians.

title: Guys and Dolls
description: In New York, a gambler is challenged to take a cold female missionary to Havana, but they fall for each other, and the bet has a hidden motive to finance a crap game.

title: Diabolique
description: The wife and mistress of a loathed school principal plan to murder him with what they believe is the perfect alibi.

title: Dam Busters, The
description: Drama based on the attempt by the RAF to destroy six dams in Germany during World War II.

title: Rebel Without a Cause
description: A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.

title: Fast and the Furious, The

title: Big Combo, The

title: Rififi
description: Four men plan a technically perfect crime, but the human element intervenes...

title: We're No Angels
description: Three Devil's Island escapees hide out in the house of a kindly merchant and repay his kindness by helping him and his family out of several crises.

title: Bride of the Monster
description: A mad doctor attempts to create atomic supermen.

title: Tarantula
description: A spider escapes from an isolated Arizona desert laboratory experimenting in gigantism and grows to tremendous size as it wreaks havoc on the local inhabitants.

title: Marty
description: A middle-aged butcher and a school teacher who have given up on the idea of love meet at a dance and fall for each other.

title: Oklahoma!
description: In Oklahoma, several farmers, cowboys and a traveling salesman compete for the romantic favors of various local ladies.

title: Seven Year Itch, The
description: When his family goes away for summer vacation, a hitherto faithful husband with an overactive imagination is tempted by a sexy new neighbor.

title: Summertime
description: An American spinster's dream of romance finally becomes a bittersweet reality when she meets a handsome--but married--Italian man while vacationing in Venice.

title: Killer's Kiss
description: Ready to catch a train to his hometown, a washed-up boxer tells us about the strange and twisty events that happened to him the past couple of days.

title: Pather Panchali
description: Impoverished priest Harihar Ray, dreaming of a better life for himself and his family, leaves his rural Bengal village in search of work.

title: Godzilla Raids Again
description: Scout pilots for a fishing company are startled to discover a second Godzilla, whose battle with rival monster Anguirus threatens to destroy Osaka.

title: This Island Earth
description: An alien flies scientists to warring Metaluna.

title: Glass Slipper, The
description: Tomboyish outcast "Cinder" Ella and the duke's charming son Charles fall in love in this comedic rendition of the classic fairy tale.

title: My Sister Eileen
description: After submitting a story of her beautiful sister, a woman assumes her identity to maintain the attention of a playboy publisher.

title: Prisoner, The
description: A Cardinal, a hero of resistance, endures brutal interrogation with unshakable resolve, refusing to confess his supposed treason. As his tormentor's methods fail, the interrogator finds himself unexpectedly moved by pity for indom...

title: Trouble with Harry, The
description: Harry's dead and, while no one really minds, everyone feels responsible. After Harry's body is found in the woods, several locals must determine not only how and why he was killed but what to do with the body.

title: Le amiche
description: A young woman returns to her hometown of Turin to set up a new fashion salon and gets involved with a troubled woman and her three wealthy friends.

title: All That Heaven Allows
description: An upper-class widow falls in love with a much younger, down-to-earth nurseryman, much to the disapproval of her children and criticism of her country club peers.

title: Lola Montès
description: When she is reduced to appearing in a circus, a notorious beauty thinks back on her past loves.

title: Richard III
description: A tale of the wicked deformed King and his conquests, both on the battlefield and in the boudoir.

title: School for Love
description: At the Conservatory of Vienna the students only have eyes for their beautiful singing teacher, tenor Eric Walter.

title: Man from Laramie, The
description: Newcomer Will Lockhart defies the local cattle baron and his sadistic son by working for one of his oldest rivals.

title: Byl jednou jeden král
description: A story about a king who out of three daughters preferred two: the most beautiful and the most cheerful, and the most intelligent, and even able to cook well, he kicked out, which he later bitterly regretted.

title: Searchers, The

title: Spanish Gardener, The
description: Rather undiplomatic British diplomat Harrington Brande (Sir Michael Hordern) takes up his new post in Spain accompanied by his son Nicholas (Jon Whiteley). The posting is something of a disappointment to Harrington, who was hoping...

title: Bad Seed, The
description: A woman realizes her daughter was born to kill.

title: King and I, The
description: A widow accepts a job as a live-in governess to the King of Siam's children.

title: Iron Petticoat, The

title: Forbidden Planet

title: Gunslinger
description: After her husband is gunned down, Rose Hood takes his place temporarily as Marshal of a small Western town.

title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
description: A small-town doctor learns that the population of his community is being replaced by emotionless alien duplicates.

title: Court Jester, The

title: Indestructible Man

title: Killing, The
description: Crook Johnny Clay assembles a five-man team to plan and execute a daring racetrack robbery.

title: Aparajito
description: Following his father's death, a boy leaves home to study in Calcutta, while his mother must face a life alone.

title: Un condamne a mort s'est echappe ou Le vent souffle ou il veut
description: A captured French Resistance fighter during World War II engineers a daunting escape from a German prison in France.

title: Rodan
description: A mining engineer investigates the deaths of his colleagues, discovering prehistoric nymphs and a creature capable of flying - and wreaking havoc - at supersonic speeds.

title: High Society
description: With socialite Tracy Lord about to remarry, her ex-husband - with the help of a sympathetic reporter - has 48 hours to convince her that she really still loves him.

title: Calle mayor [Main Street]

title: Man Who Knew Too Much, The
description: An American doctor and his wife, a former singing star, witness a murder while vacationing in Morocco, and are drawn into a twisting plot of international intrigue when their young son is kidnapped.

title: Flowing
description: Otsuta is running the geisha house Tsuta in Tokyo. Her business is heavily in debt. Her daughter Katsuyo doesn't see any future in her mothers trade in the late days of Geisha. But Otsuta will not give up. This film portraits the ...

title: Unguarded Moment, The
description: A beautiful teacher is protective of a high school boy who sexually harassed her, and later he becomes a murder suspect.

title: Eyewitness
description: Lucy Church, the sole witness to a fatal robbery, is struck by a passing bus and her life lies in the balance as the thieves wait for a chance to finish her off.

title: Sissi - The Young Empress
description: The second in a trilogy of movies about Elisabeth "Sissi" of Austria, the film chronicles the married life of the young empress as she tries to adjust to formal and strict life in the palace and an overbearing mother-in-law.

title: La banda degli onesti
description: Three decent but clumsy men facing economic difficulties reluctantly start to fabricate counterfeit bills; the son of one of them is the cop who follows the case, ignoring his father's involvement.

title: Captain from Kopenick, The
description: A young shoemaker is arrested for stealing a small amount of money, and is released after being jailed for 15 years. He wants to have a pass to get a job and start anew, but without a job he doesn't get a pass; and without a pass,...

title: Le coup du berger
description: When an unfaithful wife receives a fur coat from her lover as a gift, they must figure out a way to keep the husband from discovering the coat's true origins.

title: Autumn Leaves
description: A lonely middle-aged woman meets a younger man, but their relationship is threatened after the man's troubled past reveals itself.

title: Baby Doll
description: An immature and naive teenage bride holds her anxious husband at bay while flirting with an amorous Sicilian farmer.

title: Yield to the Night
description: Locked in her cell, a murderer reflects on the events that have led her to death row.

title: Love Me Tender
description: At the end of the Civil War, a Confederate team is ordered to rob a Union payroll train but the war ends leaving these men with their Union loot, until the Feds come looking for it.

title: Her Bridal Night
description: A country girl is discovered by a Paris magazine and becomes a top model.

title: It Conquered the World
description: A well meaning scientist guides an alien monster to Earth from Venus, so that he can rid mankind of feelings and emotions - but only death and sorrow results.

title: 7 Men from Now
description: A former sheriff blames himself for his wife's death during a Wells Fargo robbery and vows to track down and kill the seven men responsible.

title: Giant
description: Sprawling epic covering the life of a Texas cattle rancher and his family and associates.

title: 12 Angry Men
description: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.

description: Biopic loosely based on the last 18 years of Jesse James' life and focused on the relationship between brothers Jesse and Frank James.

title: Desk Set
description: Two extremely strong personalities clash over the computerization of a television network's research department.

title: Cranes Are Flying, The
description: Veronika plans a rendezvous with her lover Boris at the bank of the river, only for him to be drafted into World War II shortly thereafter.

title: Incredible Shrinking Man, The
description: After Scott Carey begins to shrink because of exposure to a combination of radiation and insecticide, medical science is powerless to help him.

title: Paths of Glory
description: A colonel defends three of his soldiers in a court-martial after they abandon a suicidal attack.

title: Old Yeller
description: In 1860s Texas, a stray yellow dog proves his worth to a frontier family, especially bonding with their teenage son who must help manage their homestead while his father works a cattle drive.

title: Three Faces of Eve
description: A doctor treats a woman suffering from Multiple Personality Disorder.

title: Funny Face
description: An impromptu fashion shoot at a book store brings about a new fashion model discovery in the shop clerk.

title: Nights of Cabiria
description: A waifish prostitute wanders the streets of Rome looking for true love but finds only heartbreak.

title: Kanal

title: Enemy Below, The

title: Seventh Seal, The
description: A knight returning to Sweden after the Crusades seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

title: Night of the Demon
description: A man seeks to return a doctor's ancient death-curse.

title: Sweet Smell of Success
description: A powerful Broadway columnist coerces an unscrupulous press agent into breaking up his sister's romance with a jazz musician.

title: Fire Down Below
description: The friendship between two tramp boat owners is threatened by the arrival of a beautiful and seductive passenger.

title: Heaven Knows, Mr. Allison
description: During World War II, an American marine and an Irish nun form an unlikely friendship after being stranded on a South Pacific island. They find comfort in one another while hoping for a rescue, as they try to avoid capture by the J...

title: Smultronstället (Wild Strawberries)
description: After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.

title: Sayonara
description: A US Air Force major in Kobe confronts his own opposition to marriages between American servicemen and Japanese women after he falls for a beautiful performer.

title: Tammy and the Bachelor
description: An unsophisticated young woman from the Mississippi swamps falls in love with an unconventional southern gentleman.

title: Bridge on the River Kwai, The

title: Prince and the Showgirl, The
description: An American showgirl becomes entangled in political intrigue when the Prince Regent of a foreign country attempts to seduce her.

title: An Affair to Remember
description: A couple falls in love and agrees to meet in six months at the Empire State Building - but will it happen?

title: Oedipus Rex
description: A kingdom faces divine punishment until its former king's killer is caught. The situation spells trouble for King Oedipus and his Queen.

title: A Face in the Crowd
description: A TV woman turns a homespun bum into a rotten media hero.

title: Sorority Girl
description: A poor-little-rich-girl feels alienated by her mother and enacts a string of torment on her fellow pupils at a girls' boarding school, increasingly aggravating them until she goes too far.

description: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

title: Mysterians, The
description: Shortly after a giant robot destroys a village, aliens from outer space arrive offering friendship. Will the people of Earth tie these two events together?

title: Kiss Them for Me

title: Forty Guns
description: Showdown in Arizona between the Bonell brothers - U.S. Marshals - and Jessica Drummond, the iron-fisted rancher who controls the territory.

title: Throne of Blood
