description: The school boys of two villages in France are fighting. Their trophy are the buttons they will snatch from the enemy. This fight will bring those kids to everlasting friendship...eventually.

title: Cartouche
description: The story of a kid from the back streets who wants to become king of Paris. Brought up among petty thieves, he becomes their leader through an audacious and elegant coup which wins him the love of the beautiful Venus.

title: Atraco a las tres
description: Galindo works in a bank. One day he convinces the other employees in the bank to plan a hold-up in the bank they are working. They prepare everything carefully. However, real robbers come just before the fake ones.

title: Walk on the Wild Side
description: Poor lovesick white-trash Dove Linkhorn arrives in New Orleans searching for his former girlfriend Hallie Gerard, an artist who works in The Doll House brothel, whose madam Jo Courtney considers her girls to be her property.

title: Vivre Sa Vie
description: Twelve episodic tales in the life of a Parisian woman and her slow descent into prostitution.

title: Longest Day, The
description: The events of D-Day, told on a grand scale from both the Allied and German points of view.

title: Treasure of the Silver Lake, The
description: In their first cinematic adventure, Apache chief Winnetou and mountain man Old Shatterhand pursue a gang of murderous outlaws who will stop at nothing to find the legendary treasure of Silver Lake.

title: Antoine and Colette
description: Antoine Doinel is 17, lives in a hotel and works in a factory making records; he loves music. He falls in love with a woman he meets at a concert. She sees him as a friend, but her parents love him.

title: Hara-Kiri
description: When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.

title: L'eclisse
description: A young woman meets a vital young man, but their love affair is doomed because of the man's materialistic nature.

title: Exterminating Angel, The
description: The guests at an upper-class dinner party find themselves unable to leave.

title: Love on a Pillow
description: A young girl rescues a man from a suicide attempt. He turns out to be a sociopath, who begins to take over her life, abusing her both verbally and emotionally, yet she can't seem to tear herself away from him.

title: Only Two Can Play
description: A frustrated librarian (Sellers) in Swansea, Wales is torn between his wife Jean (Maskell) and a glamorous married woman, Liz (Zetterling), who wants to have an affair.

title: Follow That Dream
description: A family of ragtag vagabonds sets up a makeshift home on a Florida beach after becoming marooned there, prompting an uptight local bureaucrat to attempt to evict them.

title: Kid Galahad
description: After completing his military service, Walter Gulick takes a job as a sparring partner at a gym, the owner of which sees potential in Walter as a professional fighter and takes him under his wing.

title: Girls! Girls! Girls!
description: When he finds out his boss is retiring to Arizona, a sailor has to find a way to buy the Westwind, a boat that he and his father built. He is also caught between two women: insensitive club singer Robin and sweet Laurel.

title: Adieu Philippine
description: Paris, summer 1960. Michel is about to leave for Algeria for military service. He meets Liliane and Juliette, two inseparable friends. Michel goes on vacation to Corsica, where the two girls decide to join him

title: Wonderful World of the Brothers Grimm, The
description: The story of Wilhelm and Jacob Grimm, and three of their stories.

title: No Exit
description: A valet guides a man into a windowless, mirrorless hotel room with a single entrance. Two women join them, then the valet locks them inside. Trapped, the trio realizes they're in hell, anticipating a grim fate.

title: Almost Angels
description: Despite his father's opinions, a working-class Austrian boy joins the Vienna Boys' Choir and proves to be unusually talented. However, the head chorister becomes jealous and will do everything in his power to ruin his rival's perf...

title: Great Escape, The
description: Allied officers in a German prisoner of war camp during World War II make a daring plan for a mass escape by hundreds of POWs hoping to draw German personnel and resources away from combat operations.

title: Irma la Douce
description: When a recently fired policeman falls in love with a French prostitute in Paris, he doesn't want her to be with other men, so he creates an alter-ego who will become her only customer.

title: Pink Panther, The
description: The bumbling Inspector Clouseau travels to Rome to catch a notorious jewel thief known as "The Phantom" before he conducts his most daring heist yet: a princess' priceless diamond with one slight imperfection, known as "The Pink P...

title: 55 Days at Peking
description: During the 1900 Boxer Rebellion, U.S. marine, Maj. Matt Lewis, along with British consul, Sir Arthur Robertson, develop a plan to keep the rebels at bay until an international military relief force can arrive.

title: Bakery Girl of Monceau, The
description: A law student regularly visits a Paris bakery to flirt with a brunette employee.

title: Charade
description: Romance and intrigue ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want to get their hands on a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. She soon loses trust in those who claim they want to help her.

title: Lord of the Flies
description: Schoolboys marooned on a Pacific island create their own savage civilization.

title: Shock Corridor
description: Bent on winning a Pulitzer Prize, a journalist commits himself to a mental institution to solve a strange and unclear murder.

title: Birds, The
description: A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people.

title: Beach Party
description: A bearded anthropologist studies the habits of swingin' American teens while they enjoy the summer surfing, loving, and partying at the beach.

title: Carry on Cabby
description: A taxi company is threatened when an all-female firm sets itself up in business and starts to steal their customers.

title: Contempt
description: A French writer's marriage deteriorates while working on Fritz Lang's version of "The Odyssey", as his wife accuses him of using her to court favor with the film's brash American producer.

title: Bye Bye Birdie
description: A rock singer travels to a small Ohio town to make his "farewell" television performance and kiss his biggest fan before he is drafted.

title: Sword in the Stone, The
description: A poor boy named Arthur learns the power of love, kindness, knowledge and bravery with the help of a wizard called Merlin in the path to become one of the most beloved kings in English history.

title: Khaneh siah ast (The House is Black)
description: Set in a leper colony in the north of Iran, The House is Black juxtaposes "ugliness", of which there is much in the world as stated in the opening scenes, with religion and gratitude.

title: Haunting, The
description: Hill House has stood for about 90 years and appears haunted: its inhabitants have always met strange, tragic ends. Now Dr. John Markway has assembled a team of people who he thinks will prove whether or not the house is haunted.

title: Kiss of the Vampire, The
description: When car trouble strands a honeymooning couple in a small Southern European village, an aristocratic family in the area reaches out to help them with sinister consequences.

title: Summer Magic
description: A Bostonian widow moves with her kids to the country.

title: Dementia 13
description: Ax murders follow a heart attack at an Irish castle full of mourners.

title: Tom Jones
description: The romantic and chivalrous adventures of adopted bastard Tom Jones in 18th-century England.

title: From Russia with Love
description: James Bond willingly inserts himself into an assassination plot involving a naive Russian beauty in order to retrieve a Soviet encryption device that was stolen by the evil SPECTRE organization.

title: X: The Man with the X-Ray Eyes
description: Roger Corman's acclaimed tale of a researcher's devastating experiment on himself and the unforeseen consequences.

title: Move Over, Darling
description: After being lost at sea for several years, a missing wife thought long dead returns just after her husband has remarried.

title: Silence, The
description: Two estranged sisters, Ester and Anna, and Anna's 10-year-old son travel to the Central European country on the verge of war. Ester becomes seriously ill and the three of them move into a hotel in a small town called Timoka.

title: Raven, The
description: A magician, who has been turned into a raven, turns to a former sorcerer for help.

title: Guest, The
description: While renovating his house in London, Aston, out of pity, lodges a homeless man, but Aston's brother taunts and harasses the cranky old bum.

title: 8½
description: Guido seeks peace after his success but faces pressure from past collaborators. As he struggles with creativity, he reflects on his life and past romances.

title: Sanjuro
description: A crafty samurai helps a young man and his fellow clansmen trying to save his uncle, who has been framed and imprisoned by a corrupt superintendent.

title: El verdugo
description: An undertaker marries an old executioner's daughter and must continue his father-in-law's profession after his retirement, although he doesn't like it.

title: Atragon
description: When an ancient underground civilization and their snake-like guardian plots to reclaim the surface world, those of the surface fights back.

title: Summer Holiday
description: Four bus mechanics and a stowaway travel Europe as a hotel, picking up singers. In Athens, the stowaway's mother has them arrested for kidnapping but then accepts her daughter's love for a mechanic and they vacation in Greece.

title: Servant, The
description: Upper-class Tony hires servant Hugo Barrett, who turns out to have a hidden agenda.

title: Suzanne's Career
description: The friendship of Bertrand and Guillaume is complicated when the womanizing Guillaume begins to pursue a charming girl named Suzanne.

title: Winter Light
description: A small-town priest struggles with his faith.

title: Incredible Journey, The
description: Two dogs and a cat set off on a treacherous 200-mile journey towards home.

title: Unearthly Stranger
description: Mysterious woman marries government scientist Davidson despite his lack of knowledge about her past. His bosses are suspicious of her unusual traits. After it's clear she does love Davidson, the pair come under attack.

title: It's a Mad Mad Mad Mad World
description: Several different motorists witness a single car crash in the California desert and, after the driver's dying words indicate the location of a hidden stash of loot, turn against each other in a mad dash across the state to get to it.

title: Cleopatra
description: Queen Cleopatra VII of Egypt experiences both triumph and tragedy as she attempts to resist the imperial ambitions of Rome.

title: Winnetou
description: When violent conflict breaks out between greedy railroaders and a tribe of Mescalero Apaches, only two men, destined to be blood brothers, can prevent all-out war: chief's son Winnetou and German engineer Old Shatterhand.

title: Tamahine
description: A free-spirited young Polynesian girl is sent to live with her uncle in England. The many social and other rules new to her that she encounters there, as well as attention from student body of a local school cause much hilarity.

title: It Happened at the World's Fair
description: Mike and Danny hitch a ride to the World's Fair in Seattle after the sheriff seizes their crop duster biplane to cover Danny's gambling debts. Mike looks after the driver's 7 y.o. niece at the fair, where he meets a cute nurse.

title: Mclintock!
description: Wealthy rancher G. W. McLintock uses his power and influence in the territory to keep the peace between farmers, ranchers, land-grabbers, Indians and corrupt government officials.

title: Matango
description: Shipwrecked survivors slowly transform into mushrooms.

title: Mahanagar
description: Life at home changes when a house-wife from a middle-class, conservative family in Calcutta gets a job as a saleswoman.

title: Zlaté kapradí
description: Czech fairy tale about a shepherd who finds a golden fern with magical powers. He can ensure his continued happiness if he does the right thing, but will he?

title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
description: A mentally unstable American general orders a hydrogen bomb attack on the Soviet Union, triggering a path to global nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

title: Per un pugno di dollari (A Fisful of Dollars)
description: A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.

title: Mary Poppins
description: In turn of the century London, a magical nanny employs music and adventure to help two neglected children become closer to their father.

title: Rudolph, the Red-Nosed Reindeer
description: A young reindeer Rudolph lives at the North Pole. His father is one of Santa's reindeer and it is expected that Rudolph will eventually be one too. However, he has a feature which is a setback and causes him to be ostracized: his ...

title: Der Geteilte Himmel (Divided Heaven)
description: In 1961, Rita returns to her childhood village after a breakdown. As she recovers, she remembers the past two years: her love for chemist Manfred, 10 years her senior; his enthusiasm about his new chemical process, which turned to...

title: Woman in the Dunes
description: An entomologist on vacation is trapped by local villagers into living with a woman whose life task is shoveling sand for them.

title: Bedtime Story
description: Two scam artists preying on women for their money clash in a Mediterranean hot spot. Will the cultured, high-class con artist come out on top, or will the rough small-change scammer rise to win the wager?

title: First Men in the Moon
description: When a contemporary spaceship lands on the moon, it's hailed as a new accomplishment before it becomes clear that a Victorian party completed the trek in 1899. This leads investigators to the earlier mission's last surviving crew ...

title: Long Ships, The
description: A vagabond Viking adventurer and a Moor both compete to find "The Mother of All Voices", a legendary golden bell near the Pillars of Hercules.

title: My Fair Lady
description: In 1910s London, snobbish phonetics professor Henry Higgins agrees to a wager that he can make a crude flower girl, Eliza Doolittle, presentable in high society.

title: A Hard Day's Night
description: Over two days in the life of The Beatles, the band struggle to keep themselves and Paul McCartney's mischievous grandfather in check while preparing for a live TV performance.

title: Band of Outsiders
description: Two crooks with a fondness for old Hollywood B-movies convince a languages student to help them commit a robbery.

title: Americanization of Emily, The
description: An American Naval Officer's talent for living the good life in wartime is challenged when he falls in love and is sent on a dangerous mission.

title: Zulu
description: Outnumbered British soldiers do battle with Zulu warriors at Rorke's Drift.

title: Bikini Beach
description: A millionaire newspaper publisher is fed up by the scantily clad teenagers who hang out on the local beach. Meanwhile, the teens go against an uppity young Englishman who challenges them to a drag race.

title: Man's Favorite Sport?
description: The author of a best-selling fishing guide is actually extremely inexperienced in the sport, which causes mayhem when he is entered into a competition.

title: Marriage Italian Style
description: Wealthy businessman Domenico and penniless prostitute Filumena share a large part of their lives in post-WWII Italy.

title: Hush...Hush, Sweet Charlotte
description: An aging, reclusive Southern belle plagued by a horrifying family secret descends into madness after the arrival of a lost relative.

title: Gospel According to St. Matthew, The
description: The life of Jesus Christ according to the Gospel of Matthew. Film shows Christ as a Marxist avant-la-lettre and therefore uses half of the text of Matthew.

title: King & Country
description: During WWI, a British Army Private is accused of desertion, and the officer assigned to defend him at his court-martial discovers that there is more to the case than meets the eye.

title: Onibaba
description: Two women kill samurai and sell their belongings for a living. While one of them is having an affair with their neighbor, the other woman meets a mysterious samurai wearing a bizarre mask.

title: Fail-Safe
description: A technical malfunction sends American bombers to Moscow to deliver a nuclear attack. Can all-out war be averted?

title: Viva Las Vegas
description: A race-car driver preparing for the Grand Prix wiles his time in Las Vegas working as a waiter to pay for his new engine and soon strikes up a romance with a beautiful young woman.

title: Goldfinger
description: While investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve.

title: Dead Ringer
description: The working-class twin sister of a callous, wealthy woman impulsively murders her out of revenge and assumes her identity, but impersonating her dead twin is more complicated and risky than she anticipated.

title: Umbrellas of Cherbourg, The
description: A young woman separated from her lover by war faces a life-altering decision.

title: Last Man on Earth, The
description: When a disease turns all of humanity into the living dead, the last man on earth becomes a reluctant vampire hunter.

title: Code Name: Tiger
description: A Turkish ambassador arrives in Paris to sign an important trade agreement, allowing Turkey to buy a sophisticated new war plane from France. Immediately he is the target of an assassin, and a special agent is assigned to protect ...

title: Train, The
description: In 1944, a German colonel loads a train with French art treasures to send to Germany. The Resistance must stop it without damaging the cargo.

title: Ghidorah, the Three-Headed Monster
description: A detective protects a princess who prophecies Earth's destruction by a powerful alien monster; the world's only hope being if Mothra can persuade Godzilla and Rodan to help save the planet.

title: Carry On Cleo
description: Two Britons, Hengist and Horsa, are captured and enslaved by invading Romans and taken to Rome. One of their first encounters in Rome leaves Hengist being mistaken for a fighter, and gets drafted into the Royal Guard to protect Ca...

title: Unsinkable Molly Brown, The
description: A poor, uneducated mountain girl leaves her cabin in search of respect, a wealthy husband, and a better life in this fictionalized biopic of Margaret "Molly" Brown, who survived the 1912 sinking of the RMS Titanic.

title: Red Desert
description: In an industrial area, unstable Giuliana attempts to cope with life by starting an affair with a co-worker at the plant her husband manages.

title: Godzilla vs. The Thing (Mothra vs. Godzilla)
description: When greedy tycoons refuse to return Mothra's egg to the people of Infant Island, they must decide if they are willing to answer Japan's own pleas for help when Godzilla arises near Nagoya.

title: Marnie
description: Mark marries Marnie although she is a habitual thief and has serious psychological problems, and tries to help her confront and resolve them.

title: A shot in the dark
description: Bumbling Inspector Jacques Clouseau falls in love with murder suspect Maria Gambrelli and tries to clear her name.

title: Chalk Garden, The
description: An elderly woman hires a governess with a mysterious past to look after her disturbed, spoiled teenage granddaughter, who eventually understands the meaning of self-sacrifice as an example of love and grows into a better person.

title: Nikutai no mon [Gate of Flesh]
description: An injured thief on the run finds sanctuary within a brothel of united, ruthless women.

title: La tia Tula
description: Tula, a 31-year-old single woman whose sister has just died, decides to live in the home of her bank-employee brother-in-law Ramiro and his two children. She takes control of their lives, playing wife/mother without the sexual com...

title: Seduced and abandoned
description: A desperate Sicilian man, whose 15-year-old daughter was seduced and impregnated by his older daughter's fiancé, tries to find a way to save the family's honor.

title: Time Travelers, The
description: In 1964, a group of scientists create a portal that takes them to a barren, mutant inhabited, Earth in the year 2071.

title: Old Shatterhand
description: Renegades trying to get the army to abandon their fort get the Indians addicted to whiskey, then convince them to attack and drive out the soldiers.

title: Winnetou: The Red Gentleman
description: Forester, a ruthless oil baron, wants to create a war between the native American tribes and the white men. Old Shatterhand, Winnetou and their sidekick Castlepool try to prevent this.

title: Amongst Vultures
description: Outlaws disguised as Indians commit crimes against settlers but Winnetou and Old Surehand are determined to unmask the bandits and keep the peace between settlers and Indians.

title: Yellow One, The
description: When a villain named "the Shoot" terrorizes the constituents of Albanian country, which he rules. Heroic Kara Ben Nemsi (Lex Barker), and his sidekick are the only ones who can stop him

title: Kissin' Cousins
description: An Army officer returns to the Smoky Mountains to try to convince his kinfolk to allow the Army to build a missile site on their land. Once he gets there, he discovers that he has a look-alike cousin.

title: Fate Is the Hunter
description: An airline executive refuses to believe that pilot error, by his friend, caused a fatal crash and persists in looking for another reason.

title: Honeymoon Hotel
description: Jay Menlow is jilted at the altar by his fiancée, Cynthia Hampton. His pal, Ross Kingsley, persuades him to use his reserved-in-advance accommodations at the Boca Roca Hotel (honeymooners only) in lieu of the doomed honeymoon. Ros...

title: Diary of a Chambermaid
description: A sophisticated and self-assured woman from Paris joins a middle-class rural estate as a maid and causes quite a stir among the variously uptight, perverse and violent inhabitants.

title: Roustabout
description: After a singer loses his job at a coffee shop, he finds employment at a struggling carnival, but his attempted romance with a teenager leads to friction with her father.

title: Father Goose
description: During World War II, a man persuaded to live on an isolated island and spot aircraft finds himself responsible for a teacher and several students, all female.

title: Topkapi
description: A bumbling Mediterranean con man gets involved with a group of thieves who plan to steal a highly-valuable bejeweled dagger from an Istanbul museum with a sophisticated security system.

title: Backfire
description: A greedy gold smuggler hires a handsome hero to transport a stolen fortune to a new hideout in this thrilling adventure.

title: Sound of Music, The
description: A young novice is sent by her convent in 1930s Austria to become a governess to the seven children of a widowed naval officer.

title: Gulliver's Travels Beyond the Moon
description: A young boy meets the famous Lemuel Gulliver, who has just built a rocket ship that will take him exploring outer space. The boy joins him, and the two of them go to the Star of Hope, where they find a civilization that is threate...

title: Juliet of the Spirits
description: Visions, memories, and mysticism all help a 40-something woman to find the strength to leave her cheating husband.

title: Repulsion
description: A withdrawn young manicurist who lives with her sister sinks into deep depression. When her sister leaves for a vacation, she begins to hallucinate, which quickly devolves into homicidal mania.

title: A Study in Terror
description: Sherlock Holmes and Dr. John H. Watson join the hunt for the notorious serial killer, Jack the Ripper.

title: Thunderball
description: James Bond heads to the Bahamas to recover two nuclear warheads stolen by S.P.E.C.T.R.E. Agent Emilio Largo in an international extortion scheme.

title: That Darn Cat!
description: After a kidnapped bank teller uses a neighbor's wandering cat to send an S.O.S., the F.B.I. assigns a cat-allergic Agent to the case.

title: Ipcress File, The
description: In London, a wisecracking spy investigates the kidnapping and brainwashing of British scientists while dealing with the constraints of his agency's bureaucracy.

title: Alphaville
description: An agent wrecks the main computer on another planet.

title: For a Few Dollars More
description: Two bounty killers with similar intentions but different motivations team up to take down a psychotic Mexican outlaw before he and his gang can carry out an audacious bank robbery.

title: Flight of the Phoenix, The
description: After an oil company plane crashes in the Sahara, the survivors' hopes are buoyed by one of the passengers, an airplane designer who comes up with a plan to build a flyable plane from the wreckage.

title: Viva Maria!
description: In 1907 Central America, an Irish terrorist's daughter joins a circus after meeting its singer Maria I. Her accidental striptease debut brings fame. They meet a revolutionary and end up leading a revolt against the regime.

title: Inside Daisy Clover
description: A tomboy turned movie star deals with the cruelty of Hollywood.

title: Darling
description: Beautiful but amoral model Diana Scott sleeps her way to the top of the London fashion scene at the height of the Swinging Sixties.

title: Faster, Pussycat! Kill! Kill!
description: Three thrill-seeking go-go dancers kidnap a young girl and attempt to swindle an old rancher and his two sons out of their small fortune, but their scheme does not play out as they intended.

title: Pleasure Girls, The
description: A beautiful young girl arrives in London to pursue a modeling career, and finds herself caught up in the whole "swinging '60s" scene.

title: Doctor Zhivago
description: The life of a Russian physician and poet who, although married to another, falls in love with a political activist's wife and experiences hardship during World War I and then the October Revolution.

title: Bunny Lake Is Missing
description: A woman reports that her young daughter is missing, but there seems to be no evidence that she ever existed.

title: Invasion of Astro-Monster
description: Astronauts encounter the Xiliens, who ask Earth to help save them from "Monster Zero", but when one of the astronauts romances a mysterious woman, he discovers the aliens' true intentions.

title: Daikaiju Gamera
description: From out of the arctic comes a gigantic flying, fire-breathing turtle that sets its sights on destroying Tokyo.

title: Frankenstein Conquers the World
description: An American scientist and his Japanese colleagues study a feral boy born from the radiated heart of Frankenstein's monster, while a subterranean dinosaur ravages the Japanese countryside.

title: Kapurush
description: A chance meeting rekindles old memories between a screenwriter and his ex-girlfriend, who is by now married to a well-to-do man.

title: Devils of Darkness
description: A secret vampire cult, which has its headquarters beneath the town cemetery, searches for victims for its human sacrifice rituals.

title: Mne dvadtsat let (I am twenty)
description: Following three lifelong friends who return to Moscow after military service, we see their aspirations juxtaposed against everyday life in 1960 Soviet Union.

title: How to Murder Your Wife
description: A dedicated bachelor drunkenly marries a young woman and immediately lives to regret it.

title: A Patch of Blue
description: A blind, uneducated white girl is befriended by a black man who becomes determined to help her escape her impoverished and abusive home life by introducing her to the outside world.

title: Railrodder, The
description: After literally walking to Canada from England, Buster takes a cross-country trip across Canada on a railway motorcar (speeder).

title: Oil Prince, The
description: Apache Chief Winnetou and scout Old Surehand team-up to assist a wagon-train of settlers who are threatened by the machinations of an unscrupulous crook known as the Oil Prince.

title: Winnetou: The Last Shot
description: Rollins' gang wants to grab land by inciting the settlers in a war against the Indians but Winnetou and Old Shatterhand try to keep the peace, until Rollins frames Winnetou up for the murder of Jicarilla Chief's son.

title: Old Surehand
description: Old Surehand and Old Wabble are trailing a killer, but on the way they also intervene in a dispute between the Comanche and the settlers.

title: Pyramid of the Sun God
description: Crooked Captain Verdoja captures Sternau and tortures him to reveal the whereabouts of the Aztec treasure. At the same time scheming Count Rodriganda has got that information from the rightful heiress and enters the pyramid of the...

title: Treasure of the Aztecs
description: Dr. Karl Sternau supports the Mexican national president Juarez against the army of Austrian Maximilian who have occupied the country. Karl and Juarez hope to fund their fight with the recently discovered, legendary treasure of th...

title: Red Beard
description: In 19th-century Japan, a rough-tempered yet charitable town doctor trains a young intern.

title: Knack... and How to Get It, The
description: A county girl in London meets three men, one of whom has a way with women.

title: Cat Ballou
description: A young schoolteacher turns into an outlaw to avenge her murdered father.

title: Big Job, The
description: A group of inept bank robbers released from prison discover that a police station has been erected over the place where they buried their stolen takings and try to recover it without being caught.

title: Wild Affair, The
description: Office assistant Marjorie has doubts about marrying her fiance. On her last day at work before the wedding, male colleagues flirt with her while pretending to comfort her pre-wedding jitters, satirizing the British middle class.

title: Tickle Me
description: A singing rodeo rider gets hired at an expensive all-female dude ranch/beauty spa and falls for a pretty fitness trainer who's under constant threat from a gang who wants her late grandfather's cache of gold that's hidden in a gho...

title: Girl Happy
description: A Chicago mobster hires a rock'n'roll singer and his band to keep an eye on his daughter during Spring Break in Fort Lauderdale, Florida.

title: Endless Summer, The
description: The crown jewel to ten years of Bruce Brown surfing documentaries. Brown follows two young surfers around the world in search of the perfect wave, and ends up finding quite a few in addition to some colorful local characters.

title: A Charlie Brown Christmas
description: Depressed at the commercialism he sees around him, Charlie Brown tries to find a deeper meaning to Christmas.

title: A Thousand Clowns
description: A middle-aged iconoclast, doggedly avoiding the tedium of employment and conventional life, faces the prospect of losing custody of his young ward.

title: Saragossa Manuscript , The
description: Upon finding a book that relates his grandfather's story, an officer ventures through Spain meeting a wide array of characters, most of whom have a story of their own to tell.

title: Persona
description: A nurse is put in charge of a mute actress and finds that their personae are melding together.

title: La battaglia di Algeri
description: In the 1950s, fear and violence escalate as the people of Algiers fight for independence from the French government.

title: Good, the Bad and the Ugly, The
description: A bounty-hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

title: Daisies
description: After realizing that all world is spoiled, Marie and Marie are committed to be spoiled themselves. They rip off older men, feast in lavish meals and do all kinds of mischief. But what is all this leading to?

title: Alfie
description: Unrepentant ladies' man Alfie Elkins gradually begins to understand the consequences of his lifestyle in 1960s London.

title: End of August at the Hotel Ozone
description: A troupe of young women on post-apocalyptic earth are lead around by a mistress born before the war, eventually stumbling into the company of a lonely old man.

title: Trouble with Angels, The
description: Two high-spirited young students at St. Francis Academy keep things hopping for the challenged Mother Superior and her staff of bewildered Sisters.

title: Fantastic Voyage
description: When a blood clot renders a scientist comatose after an assassination attempt, a submarine and its crew are shrunk and injected into his bloodstream in order to save him.

title: Blow-Up
description: A fashion photographer unknowingly captures a death on film after following two lovers in a park.

title: A Big Hand for the Little Lady
description: Comedy western in which a traveler bets more money than he can afford in a poker game, and unusual events follow.

title: Group, The
description: Eight inseparable college friends become involved in widely differing lifestyles after graduation.

title: Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?
description: A middle-aged New England associate professor and his wife, with the help of alcohol, use their young guests to fuel anguish and emotional pain towards each other over the course of a distressing night.

title: Jesse James Meets Frankenstein's Daughter
description: In Mexico in the 1800s Dr. Maria Frankenstein, the granddaughter of the infamous Dr. Frankenstein, transplants an artificial brain of her own creation into the skull of Jesse James' slow-witted friend Hank Tracy and names him Igor.

title: Fortune Cookie, The
description: A crooked lawyer persuades his brother-in-law to feign a serious injury in order to collect a big insurance payout.

title: Our Man Flint
description: When scientists use eco-terrorism to impose their will on the world by affecting extremes in the weather, Intelligence Chief Cramden calls in top agent Derek Flint.

title: Fahrenheit 451
description: In an oppressive future, a fireman whose duty is to destroy all books begins to question his task.

title: Sand Pebbles, The
description: In 1926, a U.S. Naval engineer gets assigned to a gunboat on a rescue mission in war-torn China.

title: Georgy Girl
description: A young woman juggles an unwanted suitor's advances and her desire for an exciting life, envying her free-spirited roommate's social whirlwind.

title: A Man for All Seasons
description: The story of English statesman Sir Thomas More who defied King Henry VIII after Henry rejected the Roman Catholic Church in order to obtain a divorce and remarry.

title: Django
description: A coffin-dragging gunslinger and a prostitute become embroiled in a bitter feud between a Klan of Southern racists and a band of Mexican Revolutionaries.

title: Andrei Rublev
description: The life, times and afflictions of the fifteenth-century Russian iconographer St. Andrei Rublev.

title: Blood Bath
description: A crazed artist who believes himself to be the reincarnation of a murderous vampire kills young women, then boils their bodies in a vat.

title: L'armata Brancaleone
description: A group of misfits, headed by an incompetent knight named Brancaleone, set out to reach the small town of Aurocastro so that their leader can take possession of the fief.

title: How to Steal a Million
description: The daughter of an art forger teams up with a burglar to steal one of her father's forgeries and protect his secret.

title: Torn Curtain
description: An American scientist publicly defects to East Germany as part of a cloak and dagger mission to steal a formula before planning an escape back to the West.

title: Godzilla vs. the Sea Monster (Ebirah, Horror of the Deep)
description: Four men searching for one's brother are shipwrecked on Letchi Island, where they encounter Godzilla, a monstrous lobster, and terrorists who have enslaved the natives of Infant Island.

title: Daimajin
description: A giant stone statue comes to life to protect the residents of a small town against the depradations of an evil warlord.

title: Return of Daimajin
description: In a mountainous region of Japan, Lord Arakawa kidnaps the men of nearby villages to use as slave labor, producing gunpowder from his sulfur pits. A band of young boys decide to rescue their enslaved fathers on their own.

title: Wrath of Daimajin
description: Giant statue exacts revenge upon those who conquer its worshippers.

title: Daikaiju ketto: Gamera tai Barugon
description: A giant monster that emits a destructive ray from its back attacks Japan and takes on Gamera.

title: Black Girl
description: A black girl from Senegal becomes a servant in France.

title: Death Rides a Horse
description: A young gunfighter bent on killing the four bandits who raped and murdered his family crosses paths with a former outlaw, who hopes to extort the same men in revenge for getting him jailed.

title: One Million Years B.C.
description: Prehistoric man Tumak is banished from his savage tribe and meets pretty Loana, who belongs to a gentler coastal tribe, but he must fight caveman Payto to win her favors.

title: Plague of the Zombies, The
description: During a mysterious epidemic in a small Cornish village, the local doctor summons his professor friend for help.

title: Dracula: Prince of Darkness
description: Ten years after his demise, Count Dracula is resurrected by his servant and preys on four unsuspecting English tourists who have taken shelter in his castle.

title: Tokyo Drifter
description: After his gang disbands, a yakuza enforcer looks forward to life outside of organized crime but soon must become a drifter after his old rivals attempt to assassinate him.

title: La caza
description: Three men go hunting rabbits during a hot day. Heat and talking about events that happened in the past make them angry, until they go totally crazy.

title: Manos: The Hands of Fate
description: A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden, underground, devil-worshiping cult led by the fearsome Master and his servant Torgo.

title: Lost Command
description: French Army colonel Raspeguy leads his paratroopers in battle against the Communist Viet Minh in Indochina and against Algerian guerrillas during the Algerian War.

title: Who Are You, Polly Maggoo?
description: A model tells a television crew about her dreams of a life with Prince Charming while she is fending off the lecherous advances of a horde of men.

title: El Dorado
description: Cole Thornton, a gunfighter for hire, joins forces with old friend, Sheriff J.P. Hara. Together with an old Indian fighter and a gambler, they help a rancher and his family fight a rival rancher who's trying to steal their water.

title: Winnetou and the Crossbreed
description: On her b-day, settler's daughter Apanatschi receives her father's secret gold mine but greedy neighboring prospectors resort to murder and kidnapping in order to get the gold, forcing the girl and her brother to seek Winnetou's pr...

title: Winnetou und sein Freund Old Firehand
description: Firehand and his Apache friend Winnetou are determined to get justice for the murder of four young braves. They set off to track down the gang responsible for the horrendous act.

title: Saraswathi Sabatham
description: Sage Naradha creates a dispute between three goddesses Saraswathi, Parvathi and Lakshmi, about who is the most powerful of them. Three of them accepts the challenge to prove their ability. Who wins the challenge ?

title: Silencers, The
description: Retired secret agent Matt Helm is re-activated in order to stop an evil organization from starting WWIII by exploding an atomic bomb over the USA.

title: Murderers' Row
description: Handsome top-secret American agent Matt Helm must recover a laser-weapons inventor who has been kidnapped by arch-villain Julian Wall.

title: Eye of the Devil
description: Workers employed at a French vineyard quietly follow old pagan rituals that call for the life of the marquis owner to save his crops during dry seasons.

title: Lt. Robin Crusoe, U.S.N.
description: A Navy pilot is marooned on an island with a headhunter's daughter and outcast tribal women.

title: Made in USA
description: In the near future, leftist writer Paula goes from Paris to the French town of Atlantic-Cité when she learns of the death of a former colleague and lover, Richard P. Is she there to investigate? On the surface, faces are beautiful...

title: Nun, The
description: Suzanne is forced against her will to take vows as a nun and three mothers superior treat her in radically different ways. Suzanne's virtue brings disaster to everyone.

title: Paradise, Hawaiian Style
description: Rick Richards is a helicopter pilot who wants to set up a charter flying service in Hawaii -- along the way he makes some friends, including a young Hawaiian girl and her father, romances Judy Hudson, and sings a few songs.

title: Frankie and Johnny
description: A riverboat singer with a weakness for gambling wants to find his lucky redhead, but his girlfriend Frankie is not amused.

title: Spinout
description: Band singer/race driver Mike McCoy must choose between marrying a beautiful rich girl and driving her father's car in a prestigious race.

title: Cool Hand Luke
description: A laid-back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

title: Jungle Book, The
description: Bagheera the Panther and Baloo the Bear have a difficult time trying to convince a boy to leave the jungle for human civilization.

title: Graduate, The
description: A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.

title: Marketa Lazarova
description: A grim portrayal of the shift from Paganism to Christianity in medieval central Europe - as a young virgin promised to God is kidnapped and raped by a marauder who her religious father seeks to kill in return.

title: Bonnie and Clyde
description: Bored waitress Bonnie Parker falls in love with an ex-con named Clyde Barrow and together they start a violent crime spree through the country, stealing cars and robbing banks.

title: You Only Live Twice
description: James Bond and the Japanese Secret Service must find and stop the true culprit of a series of space hijackings, before war is provoked between Russia and the United States.

title: Thoroughly Modern Millie
description: In New York City during the Roaring Twenties, would-be flapper Millie Dillmount's self-appointed mission to marry her boss is complicated by white slavers and true love.

title: Casino Royale
description: In an early spy spoof, aging Sir James Bond comes out of retirement to take on SMERSH.

title: I Am Curious (Yellow)
description: Told in a quasi-documentary style, this companion piece to I Am Curious (Blue) (1968) deals with topics such as class society, non-violent resistance, sex, relationships, and tourism to Francoist Spain.

title: Elvira Madigan
description: The Danish tightrope dancer Elvira Madigan meets Lieutenant Sixten Sparre, a Swedish officer who is married and has two children. They both decide to run away.

title: Dirty Dozen, The
description: During World War II, a rebellious U.S. Army Major is assigned a dozen convicted murderers to train and lead them into a mass assassination mission of German officers.

title: Valley of the Dolls
description: Film version of Jacqueline Susann's best-selling novel chronicling the rise and fall of three young women in show business.

title: Belle de Jour
description: A frigid young housewife decides to spend her midweek afternoons as a prostitute.

title: In the Heat of the Night
description: A black Philadelphia police detective is mistakenly suspected of a local murder while passing through a racially hostile Mississippi town, and after being cleared is reluctantly asked by the police chief to investigate the case.

title: Bedazzled
description: A hapless loser sells his soul to the Devil in exchange for seven wishes, but has trouble winning over the girl of his dreams.

title: Two for the Road
description: A couple in the south of France non-sequentially spin down the highways of infidelity in their troubled ten-year marriage.

title: Wait Until Dark
description: A recently blinded woman is terrorized by a trio of thugs while they search for a heroin-stuffed doll they believe is in her apartment.

title: Berserk
description: A scheming circus owner finds her authority challenged when a vicious killer targets the show.

title: Fearless Vampire Killers, The
description: A noted professor and his dim-witted apprentice fall prey to their inquiring vampires, while on the trail of the ominous damsel in distress.

title: Le Samourai
description: After professional hitman Jef Costello is seen by witnesses, his efforts to provide himself an alibi drive him further into a corner.

title: La collectionneuse
description: A womanizing art dealer and a painter find the serenity of their Riviera vacation disturbed by a third guest, a vivacious bohemian woman known for her long list of male conquests.

title: Playtime
description: Monsieur Hulot curiously wanders around a high-tech Paris, paralleling a trip with a group of American tourists. Meanwhile, a nightclub/restaurant prepares its opening night, but it's still under construction.

title: Fox, The
description: Two women, Jill and Ellen, struggle with a chicken farm. Paul Grenfell returns, restores order, and proposes to Ellen. Jill's manipulations awaken Ellen's dormant homosexuality, leading them to become lovers.

title: Asterix the Gaul (Asterix le Gaulois)
description: Asterix, the most cunning warrior of a Gaulish village resisting Roman occupation, must save their magic potion-brewing druid Getafix when he is kidnapped by an ambitious Centurion.

title: Woman Times Seven
description: Seven portraits of different types of women.

title: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner
description: A White couple's attitudes are challenged when their daughter introduces them to her Black fiancé.

title: Smashing Time
description: Two young women arrive in London to make it big in show business, and become corrupted by money and fame in the process.

title: Son of Godzilla
description: A reporter stumbles upon weather experiments on a tropical island, discovering giant mantises, a castaway woman, and an infant monster that Godzilla must adopt as his own.

title: Uchu daikaiju Girara
description: When a crew of scientists returns from Mars with a sample of the space spores that contaminated their ship, the sample escapes and grows into an enormous, rampaging beaked beast.

title: Daikaiju kuchusen: Gamera tai Gyaosu
description: Volcanic activity unleashes a bloodthirsty monster called Gyaos that Gamera must confront.

title: Koroshi no rakuin [Branded to Kill]
description: After a botched assignment, a rice-fetishizing hitman finds himself in conflict with his organization, and one mysterious, dangerous fellow-hitman in particular.

title: Peppermint Frappe
description: Julian, content, meets friend Pablo's fiancée Elena. Obsessed with free-spirited Elena who rejects him. Pursues meek nurse Ana, tries molding her like Elena.

title: Young Girls of Rochefort, The
description: Two sisters leave their small seaside town of Rochefort in search of romance. Hired as carnival singers, one falls for an American musician, while the other must search for her ideal partner.

title: Barefoot in the Park
description: Conservative young lawyer Paul Bratter marries the vivacious Corie Banks. Their highly passionate relationship descends into discord when they rent their first apartment - a rundown five-flight NYC walk-up with eccentric neighbors.

title: A Time for Killing
description: Confederate POWs escape a Union camp and make for the Mexico border chased by Union troops with both parties oblivious to the fact that peace was declared.

title: A Countess from Hong Kong
description: In Hong Kong, an ambassador returning to America meets a Russian countess, a refugee without a passport, who decides to hide in his cabin.

title: Accident
description: A beautiful Austrian coed attending Oxford University is betrothed to a fellow student, but she ends up getting involved with two unhappily married professors instead.

title: God Forgives... I Don't!
description: After a train is robbed of its payroll, an insurance agent and a card-shark team up to retrieve the loot from the bandits who guard it at a secret location near the Mexican border.

title: Django Kill... If You Live, Shoot!
description: Various factions, including a half-breed bandit, a gang of homosexual cowboys, and a priest, feud over stolen gold in a surreal town.

title: Ambushers, The
description: Secret agent Matt Helm must battle foreign spies and a rogue nation's exiled ruler in order to recover a hijacked U.S. government experimental flying saucer.

title: Don't Make Waves
description: Carlo goes on a vacation to Southern California, where he quickly becomes immersed in the easygoing local culture and becomes entangled in two beach-side romances.

title: To Sir, with Love
description: Idealistic, yet unemployed, Black American Engineering graduate Mark Thackeray takes on a temporary position teaching a group of rambunctious White high school students from London's East End slum neighborhood.

title: Two Weeks in September
description: Story of a woman torn between her love for two different men.

title: Clambake
description: The heir to an oil fortune trades places with a water-ski instructor at a Florida hotel to see if girls will like him for himself rather than for his father's money.

title: Double Trouble
description: When singer Guy Lambert goes on tour in Europe, he is pursued by two beautiful women, bumbling jewel thieves, and a mysterious killer.

title: Robbery
description: A group of British criminals plan the robbery of the Royal Mail train on the Glasgow-London route.

title: Hot Thrills and Warm Chills
description: Three women who haven't seen each other for years meet at a motel to talk about what they've done since they were together, and also to plan a heist of the King of Sex's crown during the upcoming Mardi Gras carnival. They pull the...

title: President's Analyst, The
description: A psychiatrist suddenly gets assigned to be the US president's shrink. Paranoid from the many spies tailing him in hope of kidnapping him, he runs away, and dozens of spies, and the FBI, CIA, and various agencies scramble to retri...

title: Taiyo no oji: Horusu no daiboken
description: A boy with a mythical sword wants to protect a Norse village from an evil ice wizard and his minions, who destroyed his family's village. However, the villagers don't fully trust him and a mysterious girl with a dark secret befrie...

title: Planet of the Apes
description: After being kept in hypersleep during a long expedition into deep space, an astronaut crew crash-lands in the 40th century on a planet where highly intelligent non-human ape species are dominant and humans are enslaved.

title: Charly
description: An intellectually disabled man undergoes an experiment that gives him the intelligence of a genius.

title: Producers, The
description: A stage-play producer devises a plan to make money by producing a sure-fire flop.

title: Rosemary's Baby
description: A young couple trying for a baby moves into an aging, ornate apartment building on Central Park West, NYC, where they find themselves surrounded by peculiar elderly neighbors.

title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
description: When a mysterious artifact is uncovered on the Moon, a spacecraft manned by two humans and one supercomputer is sent to Jupiter to find its origins.

title: Where Eagles Dare
description: Allied agents stage a daring raid on a castle where the Nazis are holding American brigadier general George Carnaby prisoner, but that's not all that's really going on.

title: Romeo and Juliet
description: When two young members of feuding families meet, forbidden love ensues.

title: Yellow Submarine
description: The Beatles agree to accompany Captain Fred in his yellow submarine and go to Pepperland to free it from the music-hating Blue Meanies.

title: Star!
description: A musical biography of Gertrude Lawrence, who led a hustling and bustling life on the stage.

title: Hellfighters
description: Divorced Chance Buckman fights international oil rig fires. An injury brings his daughter and to his dismay, she weds Greg, a team member. Chance gets a desk-job, so he and Madelyn remarry, but a Venezuelan oil rig fire reunites t...

title: Barbarella
description: In the 41st century, an astronaut seeks to stop an evil scientist who threatens to unleash a powerful weapon upon the galaxy.

title: Once Upon a Time in the West
description: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica teams up with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow and her land from a ruthless assassin in the employ of a railroad tycoon.

title: Party, The
description: A clerical mistake results in a bumbling Indian film star being invited to an exclusive Hollywood party instead of being fired.

title: Lion in Winter, The
description: 1183 A.D.: King Henry II's three sons all want to inherit the throne, but he won't commit to a choice. When he allows his imprisoned wife Eleanor of Aquitaine out for a Christmas visit, they all variously plot to force him into a ...

title: If....
description: In this allegorical story, a revolution led by pupil Mick Travis takes place at an old established private school in England.

title: Head
description: The Monkees frolic their way through a series of musical set pieces and vignettes containing surreal humor and anti-establishment social commentary.

title: Hang 'Em High
description: When an innocent man barely survives being lynched by a mob of vigilantes seeking justice for a rancher who was murdered, he returns as a lawman determined to bring the errant vigilantes to justice.

title: Night of the Living Dead
description: A ragtag group of Pennsylvanians barricade themselves in an old farmhouse to remain safe from a horde of flesh-eating ghouls that are ravaging the Northeast of the United States.

title: Carry On... Up the Khyber
description: Sir Sidney Ruff-Diamond looks after the British outpost near the Khyber Pass. Protected by the kilted Third Foot and Mouth regiment, you would think they were safe but the Khazi of Kalabar has other ideas.

title: Up the Junction
description: Addresses some of the major 60s social issues - a bored rich London-girl from Chelsea decides to go "slumming" in depressed Battersea, getting a flat and starts factory-work and makes friends... of which one has to get an illegal ...

title: Bride Wore Black, The
description: Julie Kohler is prevented from suicide by her mother. She leaves the town. She will track down, charm and kill five men who do not know her. What is her goal? What is her purpose?

title: Asterix et Cleopatre
description: Cleopatra decides to prove to Julius Caesar that her people are not decadent by building a palace in less than three months. When Cleopatra's architect asks the Gallic druid Getafix for help, Asterix and Obelix accompany him to Eg...

title: Funny Girl
description: The life of Fanny Brice, famed comedienne and entertainer of the early 1900s: her rise to fame as a Ziegfeld Girl, her subsequent career, and her personal life, particularly her relationship with Nick Arnstein.

title: Killing of Sister George, The
description: The life of a soap opera actress begins to unravel as she fears her character will be written out of the series.

title: Hour of the Wolf
description: While vacationing on a remote German island with his younger pregnant wife, an artist has an emotional breakdown while confronting his repressed desires.

title: Destroy All Monsters
description: In 1999, a race of she-aliens, the Kilaaks, brainwash Earth's monsters into attacking major cities, prompting a team of astronauts to stop the invaders while the monsters battle Ghidorah.

title: Il giorno della civetta
description: The new chief of the Carabinieri in a small Sicilian town must fight corrupt officials, the frightened silence of witnesses and the local Mafia boss to solve a murder.

title: Gamera vs. Viras
description: Gamera the Flying Turtle falls under the spell of evil aliens, but two children free him and he returns to fight the aliens' monster, Viras.

title: Bullitt
description: A nonconformist San Francisco cop is determined to find the underworld kingpin who killed the witness under his protection.

title: Reconstruction
description: A prosecutor, policemen and teacher bring the students Vuica and Nicu to a restaurant to re-enact their drunken brawl there, and have it filmed to show the effects of alcoholism.

title: Ice Station Zebra
description: USN nuclear sub USS Tigerfish must rush to the North Pole to rescue the staff of Drift Ice Station Zebra weather station.

title: Dracula Has Risen from the Grave
description: After a Monsignor accidentally brings Count Dracula back from the dead while exorcising his castle, the vampire preys on the holy man's beautiful niece and her friends.

title: Boys of Paul Street, The
description: In Budapest, two rival gangs of young boys lay claim to a vacant lot. The hostilities escalate yet never quite boil over into actual violence. The film poignantly portrays the struggles and resilience of youth amid the harsh reali...

title: Egri csillagok
description: 1552, the great Turkish Empire wants to conquer Europe, and the world. The last stand is Hungarian Kingdom, and the castle of Eger. The brave soldiers decides they will fight till the end of their lives.

title: Cat Has Nine Lives, The
description: Three women, a journalist, her French friend and a pop singer, deal with life, career, desire, sex and personal fantasies.

title: Wrecking Crew, The
description: Gold bullion worth USD 1 billion has been stolen from a hijacked train in Denmark. The main suspect is Count Massimo Contini. The US government sends Matt Helm, one of its top agents, to investigate and recover the gold.

title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
description: A down-on-his-luck inventor turns a broken-down Grand Prix car into a fancy vehicle for his children, and then they go off on a magical fantasy adventure to save their grandfather in a far-off land.

title: Today We Kill, Tomorrow We Die!
description: A man released after a jail term for a crime he did not commit, raises a gang to go after the man who framed him.

title: Oliver!
description: After being sold to the mortician Sowerberry, young orphan Oliver Twist runs away and meets a group of boys trained to be pickpockets by their elderly mentor Fagin in 1830s London in this musical based on Charles Dickens' Oliver T...

title: Valley of Death, The
description: An army gold shipment and its escort vanish in the Ozarks, prompting accusations of theft and desertion but frontiersman Old Shatterhand and Apache chief Winnetou help solve the mystery of the missing army gold.

title: Django, Prepare a Coffin
description: A gunfighter forms a gang of "deceased" execution victims to get revenge on the politician and outlaw who killed his wife.

title: Rape of the Vampire, The
description: After a psychoanalyst unsuccessfully tries to convince four sisters that they are not 200-year-old vampires, the Queen of the Vampires promulgates the cause of the Undead.

title: Vixen!
description: The free-spirited wife of a Canadian bush pilot seduces a Mountie, a married couple and her biker brother, all while antagonizing her sibling's draft-dodging black friend.

title: Mandabi
description: A money order from a relative in Paris throws the life of a Senegalese family man out of order. He deals with corruption, greed, problematic family members, the locals and the changing from his traditional way of living to a more ...

title: Live a Little, Love a Little
description: Photographer Greg Nolan moonlights in two full-time jobs to pay the rent, but has trouble finding time to do them both without his bosses finding out.

title: Swimmer, The
description: A man spends a summer day swimming home via all the pools in his quiet suburban neighborhood.

title: Shalako
description: A group of European aristocrats go hunting in New Mexico in the 1880s. Here they quickly come into conflict with the Apaches, who are reluctant to see guests on their reservation. Only the recluse Shalako seems able to save them.

title: Speedway
description: Poor bookkeeping saddles stock-car driver Steve Grayson with a huge bill for back taxes which hampers his ability to continue racing competitively.

title: Bat Woman, The
description: Batwoman is called to investigate a whacked-out scientist who is capturing wrestlers and using their spinal fluid to create a Gill Man.

title: Love Bug, The
description: Down-on-his-luck race car driver Jim Douglas teams up with a little VW Bug that has a mind of it's own, not realizing Herbie's worth until a sneaky rival plots to steal him.

title: Sílene smutná princezna
description: A princess in love pretends to be insanely sad to get to marry the man who will make her laugh again. Only, she doesn't know her chosen one is the prince she was ordered to marry anyway...

title: Women in Love
description: Two best friends fall in love with a pair of women, but the relationships soon go in very different directions.

title: Honeymoon Killers, The
description: An obese, embittered nurse doesn't mind if her toupee-wearing boyfriend romances and fleeces other women, as long as he takes her along on his con jobs.

title: Support Your Local Sheriff!
description: In the old west, a man becomes a Sheriff just for the pay, figuring he can decamp if things get tough. In the end, he uses ingenuity instead.

title: My Side of the Mountain
description: As young Sam Gribley runs away he learns about nature.

title: Paint Your Wagon
description: Two unlikely prospector partners share the same wife in a California gold rush mining town.

title: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
description: In 1890s Wyoming, Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid lead a band of outlaws. When a train robbery goes wrong, they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels..

title: Easy Rider
description: Two bikers head from L.A. to New Orleans through the open country and desert lands, and along the way they meet a man who bridges a counter-culture gap of which they had been unaware.

title: Computer Wore Tennis Shoes, The
description: At Medfield College, an accident with a donated computer gives Dexter Riley the ability to remember any knowledge learned instantly and perfectly.

title: Downhill Racer
description: Quietly cocky David Chappellet joins the U.S. ski team as downhill racer and clashes with the team's coach, Eugene Claire.

title: Prime of Miss Jean Brodie, The
description: An eccentric teacher's romantic ideas about life and love impress her young pupils in 1930s Edinburgh, bringing her into direct conflict with the school's conservative headmistress.

title: Italian Job, The
description: A comic caper movie about a plan to steal a gold shipment from the streets of Turin by creating a traffic jam.

title: Chastity
description: After bumming across the Southwest, a tough, young woman steals a car and runs off to Mexico, where she visits a bordello and is indoctrinated by a lesbian.

title: Kes
description: A working-class English boy spends his free time caring for and training his pet kestrel.

title: True Grit
description: A drunken, hard-nosed U.S. Marshal and a Texas Ranger help a stubborn teenager track down her father's murderer in the old American West.

title: Alice's Restaurant
description: A cinematic adaption of Arlo Guthrie's classic story-song.

title: Midnight Cowboy
description: A naive hustler travels from Texas to New York City to seek personal fortune, finding a new friend in the process.

title: Mississippi Mermaid
description: A wealthy plantation owner is captivated by a mysterious woman with a shady past.

title: Army of Shadows
description: An account of underground resistance fighters in Nazi-occupied France.

title: On Her Majesty's Secret Service
description: British agent James Bond goes undercover to pursue the villainous Ernst Stavro Blofeld, who is planning to hold the world to ransom.

title: Hello, Dolly!
description: Matchmaker Dolly Levi travels to Yonkers to find a partner for "half-a-millionaire" Horace Vandergelder, convincing his niece, his niece's intended, and his two clerks to travel to New York City along the way.

title: Godzilla's Revenge (Godzilla, Minira, Gabara: All Monsters Attack)
description: A latchkey child living in the industrial city of Kawasaki confronts his loneliness through his escapist dreams of Monster Island and friendship with Minilla.

title: They Shoot Horses, Don't They?
description: The lives of a disparate group of contestants intertwine in a grueling and inhumane dance marathon.

title: Age of Consent
description: A grizzled Australian painter decides to jolt his stale creativity by moving to a remote island on the Great Barrier Reef, where he takes on an alluring, uninhibited young woman as his muse.

title: Take the Money and Run
description: The life and times of inept bank robber Virgil Starkwell.

title: Z
description: The public murder of a prominent politician and doctor amid a violent demonstration is covered up by military and government officials. A tenacious magistrate is determined not to let them get away with it.

title: My Night at Maud's
description: A devout Catholic man's rigid principles are challenged during a one-night stay with Maud, a divorced woman with an outsize personality.

title: Passion of Anna, The
description: A recently divorced man meets an emotionally devastated widow and they begin a love affair.

title: Swimming Pool, The
description: Jean-Paul and Marianne spend lazy holidays at their villa in idyllic Southern France. However when Harry and his attractive young daughter Penelope show up, the dreamy summer days are suddenly filled with unspoken tension and jeal...

title: Django the Bastard
description: A mysterious stranger appears to take terrifying revenge on former Confederate officers who during the Civil War betrayed and were responsible for the massacre of their unit.

title: Marquis de Sade's Justine
description: Penniless and separated from her sister, a beautiful, chaste orphan must endure an endless parade of villains, perverts and degenerates who covet her virtue and life.

title: Trouble with Girls, The
description: Chautauqua manager Walter Hale and his loyal business manager struggle to keep their traveling troupe together in small-town America.

title: Charro!

A musical retelling of the American Revolution's political struggle in the Continental Congress to declare independence.

description: Ogami Itto volunteers to be tortured by the yakuza to save a prostitute and is hired by their leader to kill an evil chamberlain.

description: Maggie learns she's pregnant so she runs away from home. Before long she gets involved with some other girls on their own who have found a way of supporting themselves. She joins them in hitchhiking around wearing sexy outfits and...

description: Blossom (Pam Grier) and Django (Sid Haig) are thieving mercenaries who engineer a prison break from the outside.

description: A pair of conniving bush pilots crash-land in the Peruvian jungle, where they come across a community of diamond miners under the thumb of a greedy speculator.

description: An ex-bounty hunter reluctantly helps a wealthy landowner and his henchmen track down a Mexican revolutionary leader.

description: A black militant group robs a Mafia bookie joint and also steals the incriminating ledgers which, in turn, prompts retaliation from the mob.

description: Masako is a prostitute who works at a bathhouse in downtown Tokyo. She is sexually involved with her neighbor in the next apartment. However, when his friend falls in love with a young woman this creates a problem for all three of...

description: A group of helpless victims celebrate a birthday on an island estate crawling with killer amphibians, birds, insects, and reptiles.
